story:
Over the past 50 years, feminism has built a social mythology where women are oppressed, and men are the oppressors. The result of this has not been some reward of equality for women though; instead, modern feminist culture demands that women deserve social, financial and legal privilege at the expense of men and boys. This has normalized the idea that men are little more than disposable wallets who must be censored and subdued, and naturally, men and boys have silently suffered unimaginable pain throughout this cultural agenda.

In today’s gynocentric Wild West, men get fucked over every day at work, in schools, and in courts and no one blinks an eye. This needs to change. The problem is not just the rise of feminism though, and this book expands into an exploration of the complex relationships between male and female nature, how we think, and why we think that way. It’s about why many people feel first and think later, how men can educate and protect themselves against a culture that doesn’t value them, and what an encouragingly positive future for men could look like.

 

Whether you identify as a feminist or not, the widespread culture of modern feminism has poisoned and compromised our human ability to think objectively, and the beast of feminism will never stop until it's starved of male victims. Women already have superior rights in Western countries, so you might ask, what does modern feminism ultimately want?

The answer is right in front of us every day: more. 

 

This book is, in so many ways, my life’s work. Granted, I’m only 44 years old, but I’ve been watching, examining and intently journaling about human behavior for decades.  For most of those years, I thought my writing was pointless, even obsessive, and that those millions of words and thousands of pages were wasted. It didn’t make much sense until I started writing Men are F*cked.​

For most of my life I've been a lone wolf, even in my marriage, and I never felt like I belonged to a group. I realize now that I simply belong to the tribe called Men, and Men have a huge problem. Feminism is the greatest shit test of all time, and we, as Men, have failed it. Feminism has walked all over us for five decades, and if we don't help bring sanity to a culture gone mad, no one will.​

I’ve been through the ringer. I’ve been an inch from suicide, I’ve gone through financial ruin, I’ve done everything I could for an (ex) wife who said it wasn’t enough. And yet somehow, I’ve come out the other side, stronger than ever. I haven’t spent a year writing this so you can bring a toilet roll of bullshit quotes to your next tea party; I’m writing this because I documented my entire journey, and I believe that what I have to say will genuinely help other men.​

With ‘Men are F*cked’, I’m putting everything I have into it. I’m not holding anything back for a sequel. I have no illusions of a Male Uprising - that likely won’t happen. That’s not how men tend to work and organize. What can happen though, is that men, as a group of individuals, rekindle their voices and power and learn how to embrace those things that have been unknowingly subdued within them by the offensive cultural narrative of feminism.​

If there were ever a time for men to evolve, that time is now.​

 

 

$22,000 or 500 backers - Hate Mail

It's safe to say that not everyone will like this book. This stretch goal will unlock a bonus chapter full of the best and most outrageous hate mail I receive during this campaign. 

$36,000 or 1000 backers - Audio Book

I really like listening to audio books while I drive, and once this goal is unlocked, everyone who pledged at the $29 perk level and above will get an unabridged audio edition of Men are F*cked.

 

Funds

I need your help and support to print and ship the first 1,000 copies, get an ISBN, hire an editor, and all the other aspects of publishing.

Timing

So far, I have a working first draft of Men are F*cked, and I’ve started working on the second draft. My goal is to have all perks delivered by November 19th, 2017, which is International Men’s Day.

Though the publishing process can sometimes have unexpected delays, I’ll be working hard and doing everything I possibly can to make sure I stay on target. Getting your perks to you on time is extremely important to me.

 

I can't express how grateful I am to you for reading these words and supporting this project and our community of men. To my family and friends, throughout North America and around the world, who have helped make this campaign possible through their love and support - thank you for everything.

 

Please share this campaign on Email, Facebook, and Twitter.

Thank you for being here!

story:
About Cassandra (me!)

Up until I went to college I was pretty unhealthy. I had debilitating asthma and couldn't play sports, I ate way more than my quota of cereal and mac n'cheese, and mentally and emotionally needed a lot of work. By the time I got to college and had more control over my life, I was over the unhealthy lifestyle.  By chance, I discovered there was this whole major called Exercise Science and switched from French after my freshman year and was totally hooked!

After earning my Bachelors degree focusing on Exercise Science, Nutrition, and Alternative Medicine, I earned my personal training certification from the American College of Sports Medicine. I've been working as a full-time personal trainer every since! 

At present, I've been in the fitness industry for over 12 years and have accumulated a wealth of information about developing a wellness-filled life. However, I am still like a lot of people, struggling to balance a demanding job, a child, a relationship, family and friends, having some semblance of a life, oh, and stay in shape. My success in doing so is what I want to share with everyone in these books!

About the books

As a personal trainer, I only have so many hours in the day to help others. As an avid reader and lover of books, writing a series of books to expand my impact on others seemed all too natural. I've been brain-storming for over a year about how I could encapsulate the personal training experience in a series of books and I am ready to burst! In my mind, they're already done and changing thousands of lives in massive ways.

I have read quite a few health/wellness/fitness books and I've decided there are quite a few ways they could be improved upon. That's what I plan to do. These books will be as close to having your very own personal trainer as I am capable of producing. They will be filled with real life, useful information for all the other normal people interested in improving their own health out there. They will contain every ounce of my years of study, creativity, persnickety attention to detail, and photographer and graphic design skills (I'm building these babies from the ground up myself). 

These books will walk readers day by day through a journey to better health. I'm really going for practicality, relevance, and the ability to customize the fitness journey by combining the books to match personal goals.

But I need your help

...to get these books out of my head and on paper! What I need most is uninterrupted time so I can get my flow going and finish the first book in the series once and for all!

The first book will be all bodyweight based workouts and geared toward beginners just getting started (or started again) with a healthy lifestyle :-) The outline is completed and I'm nearly finished with the first week as I write this post. 

Tell us more!

Avec plaisir! Each book will cover 30 days and will contain a wealth of information, tips, and workouts day by day. User friendly is the name of the game. The contents will be the same kinds of things I discuss with my clients and the same kinds of workouts I do with my clients. There will be handy tips left and right, easy to follow workouts, quotes, thoughts, motivational chats, suggestions, creative ideas...they'll be a wellness smorgasbord!

Each book will be based on equipment (bodyweight only, dumbbells, medicine balls, stability balls, etc) and will begin with a beginner book and progress in difficulty for as many books as needed to take client readers from zero to hero. I have plans for books that center around yoga, Parkour, family fitness, and a whole slew of others. 

Where is my contribution going?

Part of your contributions are going to sponsor a 2-week long writing retreat in Copenhagen. While there, I will write for as long as I can each day, breaking only to become re-energized and re-inspired by the city. With no phone and no other obligations to dampen my momentum, I will ensure I return with no less than one completely ready to print book. 

From there, your contributions will help me self-publish, market, and distribute my first book. You will have paved the way for an entire series of life-changing books to enter the world!

If for some reason we exceed the $3700 goal I will apply that to updating my 10-year-old laptop so I have a more reliable, easy to transport machine to design, write, and market my books with :-)

What is in it for me?

Outside of the karmic bank deposit of helping me to realize a dream that helps thousands, you will walk away with worthy swag. Check out the right side of this campaign for what you can get. 

Other ways to help

Share this campaign on your Facebook and other social media, tell your family and friends, like my Facebook page (click here), and sign up for my newsletter on my website so you can stay in touch at FitWithCassandra.com. 

Risks and Challenges

I've already got a decent start on the first book and am fully confident in my stubborn persistence to do exactly as I say I will do, but the risk is that the book does not get completed. Of course, that's assuming a meteor hits me before I hit send to the publisher. For insurance, I'm happy, ecstatic even, to inform everyone via Facebook and newsletter of my every progress on the books. I expect the first to be finished by the end of the trip but no later than the end of 2015. Part of the reason I am doing this campaign (outside of helping me fund this) is to ensure accountability. Even we trainers need to be held accountable sometimes!

story:
Toen ik 21 was… Hoe zou jij deze zin afmaken? Wij vroegen het aan tachtigers, negentigers en eeuwelingen. Hun verhalen geven een persoonlijke inkijk in het verleden. Deze herinneringen verdienen het om bewaard te blijven, en dat is precies wat wij met Toen ik 21 was van plan zijn. Nu kan het nog, over een paar jaar misschien niet meer. Dus reizen we nu heel Nederland rond om verhalen te verzamelen. We zijn al op Texel geweest, in Zeeland, in de Randstad… En we zijn nog niet eens op de helft.

Wij zijn Kim Koops en Esther Ladiges. We hebben allebei een achtergrond als historicus en houden van verhalen vertellen en naar verhalen luisteren. Daarom hebben we dit project opgericht. We willen onze verhalen op verschillende manieren naar buiten brengen, onder andere door publicatie in een boek.

We zijn al een jaar bezig en hebben dit project tot nu toe zelf gefinancierd. De reiskosten lopen hoog op en het kost geld om het project onder de aandacht te brengen. Om dit project voort te kunnen zetten, hebben we je hulp nodig. Alle bijdragen zijn welkom!

Wil je in de tussentijd contact met ons houden? Toen ik 21 was is te volgen op Facebook, twitter en Tumblr. Help ons met het verzamelen van mooie verhalen!

story:
What happens when someone comes out of the closet in El Salvador, one of the most violent countries in the world? This book, addressing systemic violence both within El Salvador and globally, will bring you into the triumphant, complex, and resilient lives of women who are demanding visibility.

The Problem:

When there are discussion panels comprised of each letter of the LGBTQIA spectrum minus the L, there is a problem. When fliers appear on the street, as they did in 2009, “announcing the coming of death squads for “gays and delinquents”” (http://mashable.com/2016/02/15/at-the-devils-door/#o_YQDiW2isqd), there is a problem. When the global community holds the belief that lesbian, bisexual, and queer-identifying women do not exist in El Salvador, there is a problem. These are symptoms of systemic violence that is faced daily; violence that further inhibits a culture of peace in one of the most violent regions of the world.

The Pleasure is Ours

This book will fight for that peace and visibility by providing a opportunity for these women’s voices to travel the world. Comprised of mini-biographies written from in-depth interviews with over 20 lesbian, bisexual, and queer-identifying women, this book will tell their untold stories, but it goes beyond just the book. The act of learning to write your life story is one of healing and empowerment. The interviewees will participate in workshops to learn to write their life stories and replicate those workshops at book release events. Hard copies of the book will be distributed throughout El Salvador to workshop participants. The Pleasure is Ours addresses structural violence by taking another step in effective accompaniment, beginning with those who live this reality every day.

We need YOU.

We need your help to make this happen. In a country where women are excluded and their stories ignored, this treatment quickly escalates to death threat campaigns when you come out as someone society says you cannot be. The Pleasure is Ours redefines coming out in El Salvador as an experience of rejection, pain, and isolation and instead tells the stories of women whose coming out is an empowering experience of owning who they are in spite of the risk.

Inspired by this year’s slogan for the lesbian blockade in the 2017 El Salvador pride parade, the title of the book reflects on the current mindset of many lesbian, bisexual and queer women whose pride contradicts what we are led to believe about this conservative country. Support for this book provides an opportunity for women to break down those stereotypes by telling their stories and sharing those stories around the globe.

Who am I?

As someone who identifies as queer, I was drawn to find community in El Salvador when I moved here in 2014. I was oblivious to the existence of Salvadoran LGBTQIA community, believing, like many US born people, that these “types of communities” couldn’t exist in a country “like this” because it would be too dangerous. I quickly recognized how ignorant, limiting, and US-centric my beliefs were. The first time I talked about this project was when a close friend of mine was asked to be on a LGBTQIA panel at the last minute because the organizers realized they didn’t have a single woman on the panel. We talked about how women are excluded without a second thought and I shared my own ignorance upon entering the country. Throughout these years the conversation has been repeated again and again: at the bar, in LGBTQIA events, in groups with folks from the US; it is a constant topic of conversation and that conversation is what led to this book.

The Impact

The women who participate in the making of this book will have the opportunity to share their stories throughout the country and around the world. In El Salvador, The Pleasure is Ours will contribute to systemic change where the voices on the margins will be made central.  El Salvador’s single story is one of gangs, violence and poverty; the bilingual publishing of this book with further create a rift in that belief and demand a more complex vision of the country. Beyond the violence, there is a rich diversity of people filling this land and your support for The Pleasure is Ours will impact the individual participants, the women who will find community in these stories, and the structures that prevent these stories from being part of the mainstream.

The timeline:

July 2017: Conduct informal working groups with Salvadoran LGBTQ organizations to co-develop interview questions and discuss the optimal layout of the book. Develop photo release and consent form. Identify interviewees.

August & September 2017: Conduct between 10 to 20 in-depth interviews of lesbian or bi-sexual identifying Salvadoran women including photo sessions with each interviewee and as a group. Interviews may span between a few hours to several days. Each participant will have the option to contribute anonymously.

October to December 2017: Transcribe interviews and conduct follow-up interviews as necessary.

January to March 2018: First drafts of the final book text, including all transcribed and formatted interviews, introductions and conclusion. This process will include further consultations with the interviewees and members of an informal advisory committee.

March & April 2018: Translate the final text to English. Final editions and revisions made to both the English and Spanish versions.

May 2018: Train interviewees through a series of  life story writing workshops, promoting this formation at an avenue for change. Develop a plan with the interviewees for the distribution and promotion of the book and set dates for book release and writing workshop sessions.

June 2018: Convert the text to ebook format and print copies that will be distributed in El Salvador and the surrounding region. Execute book release plans led principally by interviewees. Book release events include a release party, radio interviews, online and print interviews, and workshops facilitated by interviewees for other women on how to write their life story and how the act of writing promotes change.

Budget:

I am working freelance and plan to dedicate myself full-time to this project, understanding that this book requires full-time dedication and detail-oriented concentration. This budget will make possible a polished, professional, and powerful product. 

$30 Digital voice recorder: Yemenren brand. Amazon.

$300 Editing of both English and Spanish copies.

$50 Cover design.

$300 Conversion to ebook using eBookPartnership.com.

$1,000 Printing hard copies ($10/copy, 100 copies in total) to be distributed throughout El Salvador.

$300 Rental space ($50/day) for workshops following the publication. 

$7,000 Stipend for full-time work dedicated to this project. 

TOTAL: $8,980

Other ways to help!

If you aren't able to give your support through a donation at this moment, here is a list of other ways to be involved and help make this a reality: 

  • Help with revision and editing processes.
  • Help with book layout and cover design.
  • Help with photography of each interviewee and the group.
  • Donate time to transcribe interviews (the interviews will be exclusively in Spanish).
  • Connections and advice for self-publishing.
  • Monetary donation at a later time (contact me for how to make this happen).
  • Moral support and words of encouragement! 
  • Purchasing the published ebook next year!

Thank you in advance to everyone who is working to make this a reality. This has been a dream of mine for three years now. As I look through old idea brainstorms and half-finished project proposals I've accumulated over the years, I come accross this project time and time again. It is now or never and I am excited (and terrified) to put myself out there and make this happen! 

Un abrazo/a hug,

Rachel

The first time I talked about this project was when a close friend of mine was asked to be on a LGBTQIA panel at the last minute because the organizers realized they didn’t have a single woman on the panel. We talked about how women are excluded without a second thought and I shared my own ignorance upon entering the country. Throughout these years the conversation has been repeated again and again: at the bar, in LGBTQIA events, in groups with folks from the US; it is a constant topic of conversation and that conversation is what led to this book.The ImpactThe women who participate in the making of this book will have the opportunity to share their stories throughout the country and around the world. In El Salvador, The Pleasure is Ours will contribute to systemic change where the voices on the margins will be made central.  El Salvador’s single story is one of gangs, violence and poverty; the bilingual publishing of this book with further create a rift in that belief and demand a more complex vision of the country. Beyond the violence, there is a rich diversity of people filling this land and your support for The Pleasure is Ours will impact the individual participants, the women who will find community in these stories, and the structures that prevent these stories from being part of the mainstream.The timeline:July 2017: Conduct informal working groups with Salvadoran LGBTQ organizations to co-develop interview questions and discuss the optimal layout of the book. Develop photo release and consent form. Identify interviewees.August & September 2017: Conduct between 10 to 20 in-depth interviews of lesbian or bi-sexual identifying Salvadoran women including photo sessions with each interviewee and as a group. Interviews may span between a few hours to several days. Each participant will have the option to contribute anonymously.October to December 2017: Transcribe interviews and conduct follow-up interviews as necessary.January to March 2018: First drafts of the final book text, including all transcribed and formatted interviews, introductions and conclusion. This process will include further consultations with the interviewees and members of an informal advisory committee.March & April 2018: Translate the final text to English. Final editions and revisions made to both the English and Spanish versions.May 2018: Train interviewees through a series of  life story writing workshops, promoting this formation at an avenue for change. Develop a plan with the interviewees for the distribution and promotion of the book and set dates for book release and writing workshop sessions.June 2018: Convert the text to ebook format and print copies that will be distributed in El Salvador and the surrounding region. Execute book release plans led principally by interviewees. Book release events include a release party, radio interviews, online and print interviews, and workshops facilitated by interviewees for other women on how to write their life story and how the act of writing promotes change.Budget:I am working freelance and plan to dedicate myself full-time to this project, understanding that this book requires full-time dedication and detail-oriented concentration. This budget will make possible a polished, professional, and powerful product. $30 Digital voice recorder: Yemenren brand. Amazon.$300 Editing of both English and Spanish copies.$50 Cover design.$300 Conversion to ebook using eBookPartnership.com.$1,000 Printing hard copies ($10/copy, 100 copies in total) to be distributed throughout El Salvador.$300 Rental space ($50/day) for workshops following the publication. $7,000 Stipend for full-time work dedicated to this project. TOTAL: $8,980Other ways to help!If you aren't able to give your support through a donation at this moment, here is a list of other ways to be involved and help make this a reality: 
Help with revision and editing processes.
Help with book layout and cover design.
Help with photography of each interviewee and the group.
Donate time to transcribe interviews (the interviews will be exclusively in Spanish).
Connections and advice for self-publishing.
Monetary donation at a later time (contact me for how to make this happen).
Moral support and words of encouragement! 
Purchasing the published ebook next year!
Thank you in advance to everyone who is working to make this a reality. This has been a dream of mine for three years now. As I look through old idea brainstorms and half-finished project proposals I've accumulated over the years, I come accross this project time and time again. It is now or never and I am excited (and terrified) to put myself out there and make this happen! Un abrazo/a hug,Rachel

story:
Who am I and why am I doing this?

My name is Phillip Anderson and I’ve been writing about politics in New York state for over a decade. My writing has focused mainly on corruption, ethics and good governance issues as well economic and social justice. Along the way, I even spent some time in government as New Media Director for the New York state Senate.

I’ve long chronicled the career of Governor Andrew Cuomo and how he has dealt with or often simply ignored many of the issues that matter greatly to New Yorkers and progressives across the country. I’ve written for years about the ethical shortcomings and scandals, the petty and vindictive feuds with progressives and progressive policy itself, the legislative cloak and dagger fights, all the progressive policy victories so often championed by Governor Cuomo that never seem to stand up to further scrutiny, and, last but hardly least, the all consuming political ambitions of a man that now wants to be the President of the United States.

All of this is why I feel compelled to write this book and share what I’ve learned over the years with all of those potential Democratic primary voters who maybe haven’t followed Andrew Cuomo as closely as I and others have. I’ve written roughly 700K words about Cuomo over the years, all with links to primary sources, and I’ve come to understand a great many things about the man. What I can tell you is that I feel he would be a terrible choice for the nation and an even worse choice for the Democratic Party.

Rest assured, Andrew Cuomo is definitely running for president and voters across the country deserve to know much more about who he really is as both a politician as well as someone who would seek to lead the Democratic Party forward in the post-Trump era.

Your support for this project is absolutely vital in helping to make that happen.

What you'll be supporting

By backing this project, you’ll allow me to take the time to assemble a clear and rational case for why Andrew Cuomo represents a politics that the Democratic Party and the country at large is leaving behind.

That said, let me be clear, I have no desire whatsoever to write a hit piece. This has been true for all my years of covering Cuomo. I believe the objective facts clearly support my thesis that Cuomo is the wrong candidate at the wrong time for the wrong party. I intend to make the case against Cuomo with facts, not hyperbole, not conspiracy theories, not with bullsh*t. When the governor and his crew come after this book, and they most certainly will, they will have to engage with it on the merits of the case, not on the fact that it is anyway unfair or speculative or factually incorrect.

And that’s why the case I will put forth has to be bulletproof. Your support for this project will allow me to engage an actual researcher. The book will be fully footnoted and fact-checked. It would be a waste of so much effort to write a book that can be picked apart because we didn’t get the facts right. That’s just not going to happen because the potential consequences are just too great. This is a serious endeavor and I intend to treat the entire enterprise with the seriousness it deserves.

In short, I plan on working my tail off to produce a book you will be proud to have supported.

It's much more than just a book

“The Case Against Andrew Cuomo” is also more than just a book. It will also be a living, continuously updated resource on the web with links, audio and video, and commentary as it happens*. The site, anybodybutcuomo.com, is nothing but a splash page at the moment, but that will change in the coming weeks and months. A large part of this effort is to build an accessible and genuinely useful resource for potential voters but also for journalists as well. I’ll be putting my many years of experience running online campaigns to build out the site but also a social media element that will put accurate, actionable and shareable information in the hands of citizens across the country.

By backing this project, you’ll be supporting far more than simply a book.

*And yes, before you ask, this means The Albany Project is coming back as well.

But what about stuff? Do you have stuff?

We've got some great stuff for backers! The sticker is being designed at this very moment. It's a 5x2 inch oval. It's perfect for your car or your laptop or your dog (don't put stickers on dogs) or your guitar case or whatever.

And check out this shirt!

Not bad, right?

One of the perks on offer is to have your name included in a special "backers" section of the acknowledgments. I fully realize that there are probably plenty of people who would very much like back this campaign in a significant way but have no desire to have their name included in this book. I fully understand. This is Andrew Cuomo we're talking about. If you would rather not have your name listed, just let me know. You know who you are.

We've got loads of other perks that you can check out over on the right and there will be more coming soon. As a certain US Attorney for the Southern District of Manhattan once said, "stay tuned."

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! You can be of immense help by sharing this campaign with your networks. You can follow the book on Twitter and Facebook. You can put that sticker on your car and wear that shirt and when people ask you about it, you can tell them that you know who Andrew Cuomo really is. You can tell them why you think he'd maybe not the best choice for the country or the Democratic Party in general. You can tell your friends in Iowa and New Hampshire and South Carolina and elsewhere that maybe they should consider someone else.

story:
The Presidential Pals

Little Georgie Washington and his Presidential Pals is the first in what is intended to be a series of short story books (ages 4-10yrs) following the fictional adventures of a young President George Washington and his “Justice League”- style team of mini vigilante presidents. All of which operate from a secret control room deep beneath the White House.

Each book will feature a historically accurate quote from the various presidents with underlining themes and a positive message/life lesson.

Aside from being a fun read, this series is intended to be partly educational-providing important historical facts, quotes and dates. 

Even though Georgie Washington is the leader, each book will focus on a different president and in some way, incorporate something famous that president did while in office.

There is absolutely no political motivation or any hidden messages.

The Next 8 Books in the Series

Little Georgie Washington & his Presidential pals: In the first book we are introduced to little Georgie Washington who is essentially the leader of the gang. When an unfriendly cat appears on the white house lawn, Georgie try’s his best to befriend him but the kitten makes it clear he just wants to be left alone. This leads to a large chase that eventually lands the cat in the top of a tree. Unable to jump down himself, Georgie enlists the help of his presidential pals to help rescue him, only to find out the cat is still unappreciative. 

Little Donnie Trump & his Presidential Pals: In the second book we are introduced to the newest member of the Prez-Pals. Little, mischievous Donnie Trump. When Georgie suggests a day out to an amusement park to welcome the newest member of the gang, the presidents jump for joy but when they arrive they are surprised to find out that little Donnie has purposely jammed the “yuge” rollercoaster with the gang all on board so that he may have the park all to himself- but he soon comes to his senses when little Franky Roosevelt teaches him that rides can be more fun when we all ride them together.

Little Georgie Bush & his Presidential Pals: In the third installment, the White House is visited by friendly aliens but when little Georgie W. engages the alien visitors in an epic food fight, little Jonny Kennedy must step in and teach W to respect our Alien friends and what it means to ‘play nice’. 

Little Barry Obama & his Presidential Pals: When a giant heard of elephants escapes from the local wildlife park, Barry Obama springs to the rescue. But with the presidential pals convinced that they can't possibly track them all, Obama insists ”yes we can!” and shows the presidents that with a little hope we can accomplish anything when we work together. 

Little Abe Lincoln & his Presidential Pals: Its Georgie Washington’s birthday and good ole’ honest Abe is in charge of throwing the biggest birthday celebration the nation has ever seen at the famous Mt. Rushmore but the presidents are in for a real surprise when they find out that the mischievous cat from the first book is back to sabotage the party. And this time he means business.

Little Jonny Kennedy & his Presidential Pals: When little Kennedy takes four other presidents to the moon to collect ‘space candy’ for all the children of earth he doesn't plan on encountering an asteroid shower. When ground control is unable to help- he warns the other presidents to ask not what our country can do for us but what we can do for our country. With little Trump’s help the four presidents fashion a wall out of ‘Space Candy’ blocking the asteroids and saving the earth. 

Little Teddy Roosevelt & his Presidential Pals: When a school bus full of children on a field trip to the grand canyon breaks down in the middle of a rickety bridge, Little Teddy Roosevelt comes to the rescue and assures the children that if you speak softly and carry a big stick; you will go far. 

Little Ronnie Reagan & his Presidential Pals: When a mysterious cat-burglar breaks into the presidential library, Little Ronnie Reagan happens to be there reading. With the help of little Tommy Jefferson he catches the sneaky villain and they both make the shocking discovery that the burglar is in actual fact the owner of Georgie Washington's mischievous feline friend from the first book. We also learn how the cats feet came to be in bandages and why exactly he is so dastardly.

The Illustrator

I was fortunate enough to collaborate with the bright, budding and up & coming artist, Christina Liang whom I met through a close friend in the art world.

She saw my vision instantly and was able to bring her own unique spin on the characters and the world in which they live. I am extremely blessed to have such a raw talent on-board.

Feel free to check out more of her work at www.christinaliang.com

Risks and challenges

The biggest challenge with creating a book is ALWAYS following through. Having the patience to adapt an idea and see it through all the way to the end. After a long period of research I am extremely confident that this series has the potential to be a huge success. We have scoured the market and there is nothing remotely similar. I have devoted and will continue to devote most of my time to ensuring the best possible outcome for the Presidential Pals series. All eight books you see listed above have been completed (minus the illustrations).

story:
About this project

From the author  

Usually, when people telling about their biography, they boast of their achievements. But I can boast of a whole list of places where I was refused. 
My name is Kateryna Vyhivska, I'm 22 years old. I tried to become a drawing teacher, but i wasn't accepted. And I entered the Faculty of Linguistics. In the first year of university with me began to cooperate fund of support of young artists. It's easy to guess that after a while I was kicked out. After that, I went around all sorts of art cafes in our city and offered to hang my paintings for a while, but they told me that this is not their format. Now I sell my paintings in the Internet, and if I had only one finger on the hand, then I could count my fans on the fingers of one hand. Hello, Lily!  
 

About the book 

One London publishing house wants to publish my coloring book. And for this I need money. My style is something average, between naive art and psychedelic.  







In the video, only a part of the drawings from my book. The book consists of 54 drawings, among which are: 
- Cities of the world by my eyes;
- Patterns;
- Сhemical factories, worms, cockroaches, poisons, divers, that is all that inspires me. I believe that such genre of coloring book has a right to exist. And I hope to find people who think the same way.





 

What is the current stage of the project?  

The project is at the final stage. My book is completely ready for printing. It remains only to collect the necessary sum of money. 





 

Can I help in other ways?

Of course! I would be happy if you shared a link to my project with your friends! So you will very much help my book to see the world faster! Well, and +1 to your karma!



Budget  

My budget consists of:  

1. The cost of delivery (which I take on myself) and gifts to the backers;

2. The Indiegogo Commission;

3. Payment commission;

4. The cost of printing a book. 

Rewards

 


Risks and challenges

I worked about a year and a half with this book and about 4 months to start my project at  IndieGoGo. I believe that during this time I have considered all possible problems and ways to solve them. But in any case, I will always be happy to answer all your questions.

story:
THE STORY BEHIND THE TRUTH ABOUT NEW YORK

Telling the real story of New York — offering an account that’s more inclusive, accurate, and accessible than what you usually find in typical travel guides or academic cultural studies — has never been more important than it is today.  New York, which continues to help shape and define culture the world over, has always been a deeply influential player on the world stage, most notably in the arts and entertainment industries.  Right now, tolerance and multiculturalism is under serious attack in America and around the globe; yet New York remains a powerful beacon for the broad scope of the human experience.  So it's no wonder then that millions of people gravitate to New York.

But New York is a very complex city.  While it is certainly a place full opportunity and excitement, it is also a place that can be quite unforgiving, especially to those who are unfamiliar to its unique flow and character.  This is why before you move to New York, you should know what you’re really getting into.  And if you’re already living in New York, but haven’t quite figured things out yet or would like to expand your understanding of this town, then there are a number of things you need to know if you plan on extending your stay or if you simply want to maximize the time that you still have left here.

Typical travel guides won’t help you in this regard; their focus is restricted to “what to do” lists, fun-time activities, etc. People who want to live or spend significant time in New York need something deeper, a guide that explores the real New York in candid terms. Enter The Truth About New York.  

The Truth About New York aims to enlighten those who haven’t been to New York, just as much as it seeks to broaden the understanding of veteran New Yorkers.  And because the vacation-get-away version of New York will always be a fantastic endeavor, The Truth About New York also serves as a great supplement to conventional travel guides.

 

WHAT MAKES THIS BOOK SO AMAZING?

A few things: 

IF YOU LOVE TO LEARN ABOUT THINGS AS THEY REALLY ARE:

YOU’RE GOING TO LOVE THE NATURE OF THIS BOOK.  New York is open and liberal by nature, but this narrative contains many twists and turns.  The Truth About New York includes hard truths about socio-economics, work, race, ethnicity, housing, gender, the arts, friendship, dating, sex, the New York mentality, and more.  No topic is taboo, no punches are held, and everything is covered straight up, no chaser.  And The Truth About New York is far more inclusive and culturally informative than any other book you’ll ever read about life in contemporary New York.

IF YOU LOVE NEW YORK:

  • YOU’RE GONNA LOVE NEW YORK EVEN MORE.  If you’ve ever wondered what makes New York tick; why there’s so much vibrant energy here; how there’s more than 800 languages spoken here and why we still understand each other; why you can come to New York with nothing and still make it; you will completely understand after you read The Truth About New York.

 

IF YOU HATE NEW YORK:

  • YOU WON'T HATE NEW YORK ANYMORE. Honest!  But you might be more terrified of New York than ever before.  Or you may be inspired to pick up everything you own and move to New York on a whim.

 

IF YOU WANT ALL THE BIG QUESTIONS ABOUT NEW YORK FINALLY ANSWERED:

ALL OF YOUR BIG QUESTIONS WILL FINALLY BE ANSWERED, like:

  • “What’s the deal with New Yorkers?” (We think we’re the best… Read the book!)
  • “Where can I find a nice, spacious, affordable apartment in New York?” (There’s no such thing in New York… Read the book!)
  • “Is Brooklyn really the way it’s portrayed in the television show 'Girls'? (No! But in North Brooklyn, it’s, well, complicated… Read the book.)

The Truth About New York was published by my company, Superchamp Books, and made available in limited quantities almost a year ago.  I made this move as a business decision to break deeper into a publishing market that now makes it more possible for independent publishers to compete.  

I was astonished when I learned that the Village Voice had selected The Truth About New York as one of its 2016 “Village Voice Gift Guide” books and dubbed it the "ultimate New York City guide;” and I was equally encouraged when Emily J. Smith (Salon) reviewed The Truth About New York and called it a “must read” that is “remarkably useful and deeply relatable.” 

From the start, my objective has been to make The Truth About New York a household name.  Given the recent buzz, I’m now poised to make this a reality.  But in order to do this as an independent publisher, I need to raise the level of money that will help expand upon the buzz that has only just begun. This means re-publishing (expansion of production and printing), implementing sustainable marketing, and creating multi-lingual versions of the book.

ABOUT “THE TRUTH ABOUT NEW YORK” PODCAST

With writing leadership and structural guidance from writer and campaign team member Darley Stewart, and media advice and guidance from Jamie Claar, Acquisitions Editor, Superchamp Books, I will launch “The Truth About New York” podcast.  This hour-long, weekly podcast will be based around the structure of the book and it will expand on many of the topical areas covered in the book, like culture, race, art, dating, sex, nightlife, gender, politics, and more. Each episode of "The Truth About New York," which will be co-written by Darley, will feature at least one New Yorker of note as well as one everyday New Yorker and some of the interviewees I spoke with during my research for the book.  

ABOUT “THE TRUTH ABOUT NEW YORK” FILM

To be directed by Amir Ali Said (my son) and me, this documentary will draw from the book, touching on many of the topical areas covered, but it will offer the sort of visual narrative that only a film can provide.  The film will feature interviews and commentary from New Yorkers of note, including members of New York arts institutions and organizations and leading industries, as well as a variety of everyday New Yorkers and a number of the people that I interviewed during my research for the book.  

 

WHAT IS INDIEGOGO AND HOW DOES IT WORK?

Indiegogo is a conduit for creatives to bridge the gap between imagination and implementation. The platform gives artists, innovators, and entrepreneurs like me the opportunity to reach audiences directly for funding creative projects.  I'm using Indiegogo because it allows me to go directly to you and humbly ask for your support.  I hope that the success of my project serves as inspiration for others.  At the same time, I want my project to be a leading example of the evolving dynamic of publishing, as it demonstrates how anyone with a great idea, regardless of socio-economic background, race, or gender, can produce it and bring it to market. 

 

WHY SHOULD YOU CONTRIBUTE?

In short, because you care; because you value the arts and culture, and you understand what it takes.  Furthermore, this project will create at least 20 new solid freelance jobs for a variety of people within the at-large creative community in New York, across America, and around the globe. When creatives stick together, we all rise!  Projects like this one provide work that allow fellow creatives to continue their mission of contributing to culture and speaking truth to power.   

 

ABOUT THE AUTHOR 

Hello, I’m Amir Said.  My family, friends, and colleagues call me Said.  I’m a writer, musician, and the founder of Superchamp Books, an independent publishing company based in New York. I’ve written and published multiple books on a variety of important cultural topics, including The Art of Sampling (copyright law & music sampling), Ghetto Brother (Benjy Melendez's memoir & NYC street gang culture of the 1970s), The BeatTips Manual (the art of beatmaking & comparative analysis to the Western classical music tradition), and Medium Speed in the City Called Paris (poetry). 

I'm also the founder and editor-in-chief of BeatTips, the world's most renowned publication for the study of the art of beatmaking, and the founding art director for the Get Off Your Robot music, dance, art, and technology festival (Vienna, Austria).  My writing has appeared in a number of different publications, including About.com, Scratch Magazine, HipHopDX, and The Find Magazine.  I’m currently editing Getting My Voice Back, a memoir by American author Mariah Schwartz, due to be published in the fall of 2017.

 

ABOUT LEAD TEAM MEMBER & PODCAST WRITER DARLEY STEWART

Darley Stewart is a Scottish-Korean fiction writer based in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn. Her work has appeared in Tin House, Funhouse Magazine, The Ocean State Review, Flapperhouse, The Brooklyn Rail, Battersea Review, Electric Literature, and elsewhere. Stewart is the recipient of a 2016 Fiction International Fellowship from Seoul Art Space and 2015 Ocean State Fiction Scholarship from The University of Rhode Island. An alumnus of Brandeis University and The University of Edinburgh, she interviews Brooklyn authors for Park Slope Reader, LitScene and on a freelance basis. She gives regular readings in Brooklyn, most recently Manhattanville Reading Series at Unnameable Books.

 

A CALL TO ACTION

The quickest and easiest way to help us right now is to support us with your generous contribution.  We also welcome help in many other ways as well.  If you’re a philanthropist (or know someone who is) who would like to make a more substantial contribution, please contact us.  If you have any helpful ideas to that will bring us to our goal, please contact us.  Lastly, please get the word out and help bring attention this campaign.  Use the Indieggo share tools and share this campaign with your friends and family within your social networks.

 

Thank you,

Said and Darley

THE STORY BEHIND THE TRUTH ABOUT NEW YORK
Telling the real story of New York — offering an account that’s more inclusive, accurate, and accessible than what you usually find in typical travel guides or academic cultural studies — has never been more important than it is today.  New York, which continues to help shape and define culture the world over, has always been a deeply influential player on the world stage, most notably in the arts and entertainment industries.  Right now, tolerance and multiculturalism is under serious attack in America and around the globe; yet New York remains a powerful beacon for the broad scope of the human experience.  So it's no wonder then that millions of people gravitate to New York.
But New York is a very complex city.  While it is certainly a place full opportunity and excitement, it is also a place that can be quite unforgiving, especially to those who are unfamiliar to its unique flow and character.  This is why before you move to New York, you should know what you’re really getting into.  And if you’re already living in New York, but haven’t quite figured things out yet or would like to expand your understanding of this town, then there are a number of things you need to know if you plan on extending your stay or if you simply want to maximize the time that you still have left here.
Typical travel guides won’t help you in this regard; their focus is restricted to “what to do” lists, fun-time activities, etc. People who want to live or spend significant time in New York need something deeper, a guide that explores the real New York in candid terms. Enter The Truth About New York.  
The Truth About New York aims to enlighten those who haven’t been to New York, just as much as it seeks to broaden the understanding of veteran New Yorkers.  And because the vacation-get-away version of New York will always be a fantastic endeavor, The Truth About New York also serves as a great supplement to conventional travel guides.

A few things: 
IF YOU LOVE TO LEARN ABOUT THINGS AS THEY REALLY ARE:
YOU’RE GOING TO LOVE THE NATURE OF THIS BOOK.  New York is open and liberal by nature, but this narrative contains many twists and turns.  The Truth About New York includes hard truths about socio-economics, work, race, ethnicity, housing, gender, the arts, friendship, dating, sex, the New York mentality, and more.  No topic is taboo, no punches are held, and everything is covered straight up, no chaser.  And The Truth About New York is far more inclusive and culturally informative than any other book you’ll ever read about life in contemporary New York.
IF YOU LOVE NEW YORK:
YOU’RE GONNA LOVE NEW YORK EVEN MORE.  If you’ve ever wondered what makes New York tick; why there’s so much vibrant energy here; how there’s more than 800 languages spoken here and why we still understand each other; why you can come to New York with nothing and still make it; you will completely understand after you read The Truth About New York.
 
IF YOU HATE NEW YORK:
YOU WON'T HATE NEW YORK ANYMORE. Honest!  But you might be more terrified of New York than ever before.  Or you may be inspired to pick up everything you own and move to New York on a whim.

story:
In Short 

The Faroe Islands is a small nation located in the North Atlantic, between Scotland and Iceland. With its small population and largely pristine nature the islands have long been a hidden gem of Northern Europe. There are two traditionally important trades in the Faroe islands, fishing and sheep herding, which still play an important role in the Faroese society and economy today. Just like all over the globe these livelihoods are subject to major disruptions due to concerns over climate change and sustainability. The Faroe Islands Project aims to cover the effect these changes are having on the people and communities behind these traditional ways of life. 

The Faroe Islands is largely in the mercy of the forces of nature due to its location which will provide subtle tell tale signs of future environmental impacts.The project will look into the delicate natural microcosm of the Faroe Islands and the unique relationship the Faroese have with the environment to try to understand the effects climate change will have on our everyday lives. The Faroe Islands, where these traditional livelihoods still form a core part of the community, will also give us clues as to what the future of a more sustainable and natural food production might look like.

I plan to stay in the Faroe Islands for three weeks, spending time with people within both the sheep herding and fishing communities. I will be gathering material in a variety of mediums for the final piece which will consist of a multimedia online experience and a print object. These two elements will form a whole and both will contain material specifically designed for the outlet, embracing the native forms of both online and print journalism.

 

Why it matters

The project will aim to gain insight in to consequences of large scale environmental changes disrupting traditional lifestyles and how it affects the people and communities involved. Climate change is one of the greatest global threats today and the need for sustainability has already affected our everyday lives in major ways.

The complex issues of our food production and consumption are often reported on a more global level, focusing on the large scale. That is why I want to discover the human stories of the people who are directly affected by the uncertainty of these traditional livelihoods, shifting the focus to the smaller scale. 

As our news cycles grow shorter and growingly focused on breaking news Slow Journalism projects like the Faroe Islands Project are increasingly important because they provide a deeper understanding of the issues and allow journalists to take the time to record genuine human stories. 

 

The reason we're here - I need your help!

Traveling to the remote corners of the world is never easy - nor cheap! Though the Faroese capital, Torshavn, is reachable by plane only two airlines fly the route, driving ticket prices up for us adventurous souls. There are currently only two hostels in the Faroe Islands and to get around between the islands I will have to use both the local ferry and helicopter services. On top of this I will need weatherproof gear to protect myself and my camera from the unpredictable Faroese nature. I quickly realised all these expenses were piling up, which is why I started this campaign. Now you get a chance to support young, longform journalism!

 Below you can find a breakdown of my budget for the whole three weeks.

  • Flights: 700€
  • Accommodation in a hostel: 650€
  • Local transportation: 350€
  • Daily food/necessities budget 28€/day: 600€
  • Equipment (weatherproof shoes, jacket, trousers, and backpack): 450€

 

Great perks!

No contribution is too small and all of them come with a personal way of me thanking you. When you make a donation to my project I want you to receive something great in exchange for your support. Here you can find the details on all the different perks I've prepared for you. Though if you decide to become a part of the Faroe Islands Project, there might be some surprise options just for you!

Thank you Message

A personal thank you message from me for supporting the project. You can choose to go the traditional way with an email or if you want to flaunt your support for independent journalism get your thank you on Twitter instead!

Thank you Note

Get a special handwritten thank you note with an original photo. These will be arriving a bit later than the message as they will have an image from the Faroe Islands printed in special postcard format. 

Thank you Note + Access to the Blog 

Get the lovely handwritten thank you note with an original photo from the Faroe Islands plus access to a private blog where I will be sharing updates on the project, exclusive content, and peeks behind the scenes.

Photostrip + Access to the Blog

You will get 6 original photos (6cm x 6cm) printed on a strip of high quality fine art photo paper. All strips will be numbered. On top of this get access to a private blog where I will be sharing updates on the project, exclusive content, and peeks behind the scenes.

Medium sized print + Access to the Blog

You'll get a beautiful print (12cm x 18cm) of an original photograph from the Faroe Islands Project printed on high quality fine art photo paper. All prints will be numbered. On top of this get access to a private blog where I will be sharing updates on the project, exclusive content, and peeks behind the scenes.

Large sized print + Access to the Blog

You'll get a stunning print (20cm x 30cm) of an original photograph from the Faroe Islands Project  printed on high quality fine art photo paper. All prints will be numbered. On top of this get access to a private blog where I will be sharing updates on the project, exclusive content, and peeks behind the scenes.

Supporter Pack

If you really want to support the Faroe Islands Project then this is your pack. You'll get a large (20cm x 30cm) print as described above as well as access to the private blog. On top of this you will receive a signed copy of the Final Print Object which will contain amazing photography and journalism!

Supporter Pack+ 

If you want to support the Faroe Islands Project and be able to show your support around town then get the Supporter Pack+. You will get everything in the Supporter Pack plus an "I Support Slow Journalism" tote bag.

Premium Supporter Pack

This pack is for those of you on top of wanting to support slow journalism really love great photography. With the Premium Supporter pack you will get everything in the Supporter Pack+ and two additional prints (20cm x 30cm) of beautiful original photograph from the Faroe Islands Project.

Sponsor Pack

The ultimate way to support the Faroe Islands Project is to become a sponsor! The Sponsor Pack includes:

• Access to private Blog

• Two copies of the Final Print Object

• Two supporter tote bags

• Three large prints of original photography from the Faroe Islands Project

AND

• Your name or logo listed as a sponsor in the thank you section of the Final Print Object!

 

Spread the word!

If donating really isn't for you, don't worry, there are other ways you can help support creative, independent journalism and the Faroe Islands Project. The easiest thing is to SHARE THE LINK on social media and TELL YOUR FRIENDS about the project. With a simple post you can spread the word and help the project reach it's goal!

 

About me

I am a postgraduate student currently on the MA Arts and Lifestyle Journalism course at London College of Communication. I have a background in photography from my BA which I did in Paris. I'm originally from Finland but have lived and travelled abroad most of my life!

The Faroe Islands Project is the Final Major Project for my MA degree and will also be on display at the LCC Degree Show in November 2017.

Daily food/necessities budget 28€/day: 600€
Equipment (weatherproof shoes, jacket, trousers, and backpack): 450€


 
Great perks!
No contribution is too small and all of them come with a personal way of me thanking you. When you make a donation to my project I want you to receive something great in exchange for your support. Here you can find the details on all the different perks I've prepared for you. Though if you decide to become a part of the Faroe Islands Project, there might be some surprise options just for you!
Thank you Message
A personal thank you message from me for supporting the project. You can choose to go the traditional way with an email or if you want to flaunt your support for independent journalism get your thank you on Twitter instead!
Thank you Note
Get a special handwritten thank you note with an original photo. These will be arriving a bit later than the message as they will have an image from the Faroe Islands printed in special postcard format. 
Thank you Note + Access to the Blog 
Get the lovely handwritten thank you note with an original photo from the Faroe Islands plus access to a private blog where I will be sharing updates on the project, exclusive content, and peeks behind the scenes.
Photostrip + Access to the Blog
You will get 6 original photos (6cm x 6cm) printed on a strip of high quality fine art photo paper. All strips will be numbered. On top of this get access to a private blog where I will be sharing updates on the project, exclusive content, and peeks behind the scenes.
Medium sized print + Access to the Blog
You'll get a beautiful print (12cm x 18cm) of an original photograph from the Faroe Islands Project printed on high quality fine art photo paper. All prints will be numbered. On top of this get access to a private blog where I will be sharing updates on the project, exclusive content, and peeks behind the scenes.
Large sized print + Access to the Blog
You'll get a stunning print (20cm x 30cm) of an original photograph from the Faroe Islands Project  printed on high quality fine art photo paper. All prints will be numbered. On top of this get access to a private blog where I will be sharing updates on the project, exclusive content, and peeks behind the scenes.
Supporter Pack
If you really want to support the Faroe Islands Project then this is your pack. You'll get a large (20cm x 30cm) print as described above as well as access to the private blog. On top of this you will receive a signed copy of the Final Print Object which will contain amazing photography and journalism!
Supporter Pack+ 
If you want to support the Faroe Islands Project and be able to show your support around town then get the Supporter Pack+. You will get everything in the Supporter Pack plus an "I Support Slow Journalism" tote bag.
Premium Supporter Pack
This pack is for those of you on top of wanting to support slow journalism really love great photography. With the Premium Supporter pack you will get everything in the Supporter Pack+ and two additional prints (20cm x 30cm) of beautiful original photograph from the Faroe Islands Project.
Sponsor Pack
The ultimate way to support the Faroe Islands Project is to become a sponsor! The Sponsor Pack includes:
• Access to private Blog
• Two copies of the Final Print Object
• Two supporter tote bags
• Three large prints of original photography from the Faroe Islands Project
AND
• Your name or logo listed as a sponsor in the thank you section of the Final Print Object!
 

Spread the word!
If donating really isn't for you, don't worry, there are other ways you can help support creative, independent journalism and the Faroe Islands Project. The easiest thing is to SHARE THE LINK on social media and TELL YOUR FRIENDS about the project. With a simple post you can spread the word and help the project reach it's goal!
 
About me
I am a postgraduate student currently on the MA Arts and Lifestyle Journalism course at London College of Communication. I have a background in photography from my BA which I did in Paris. I'm originally from Finland but have lived and travelled abroad most of my life!
The Faroe Islands Project is the Final Major Project for my MA degree and will also be on display at the LCC Degree Show in November 2017.

story:
Organizing a Writer's Residence Space in Tbilisi, Georgia

Betania Writer’s Residence is a space project organized by the international autonomous collective to support intellectual labor of individuals and teams by providing a research residence and co-working space on any stage of their work in the quiet and peaceful mountainous village outside Tbilisi, Georgia.

 
Our main goal is to establish an open, innovative and cooperative international space platform for various practices of intellectual work, be it literary or scientific, and enable networked reflections and research about interconnected local and global challenges we face in the world today.

The Writer's Residence will provide interested individuals and teams identifying themselves with our goals to apply and reserve some spots on our residence space throughout the year,  for a time live and work in the surroundings, and invite their desired colleagues from elsewhere for mutually elaborating individual or collaborative project initiatives. In that way, we think of the Betania scene, as a birth-place of various new initiatives that can later find their shape in Georgian or other contexts and translate into wider societal projects.

Visiting residents will not be limited to certain topics or disciplinary boundaries. In the best scenario, projects hosted by the space, would tackle wide range of contemporary challenges we face in our societies today, and could later be translated into a societal project and get public outreach.

We particularly seek to support projects that bring to the fore the salient issues that are currently problematic to the region and particularity to Georgia, but we do not limit our scope with the local focus only. We want to engage in the global dialogue that goes far beyond the local peculiarities and contribute, as well as learn from that. For that, we are open to hosting individuals or teams dealing with topics and issues characteristic to any part of the world and plan to link and grow our diverse and extended network members from all over the world, exchange our views and develop common projects through available resources. We are particularly eager to create an international co-working space with literature resources for projects that could possibly benefit from the geographical location of Georgia, work-friendly atmosphere in nature and our library infrastructure. 

Our team is an international autonomous collective of around 15 individuals with an experience of working in international academic or artistic institutions. We have met each other in different, academic, artistic or personally created settings of Berlin, Budapest, Tbilisi, Telavi, Bucharest, or Betania, and through cycles of critical discussions about current state of global educational and research affairs, developed a network of like-minds who are willing to put an effort in developing the experimental residential working space and building up a network. The project of this kind to our knowledge does not have an analog regionally and even internationally. 

Through this crowdfunding, we want to arrange basic water and accommodating infrastructure and become available to offer short-term (2-4 weeks) residence for our writers in residence.

Project Spot:  Our space is a three-floor residential house located in the beautiful green and calm nature setting of Betania area - 25 km. above the central Tbilisi district, in between mountains, overlooking the expansive view of the city. Space provides the possibility of organizing accommodation as well as public events.

We look forward to your support as well as visit.

Kindly, 
Our team

story:
Having been vegan for 27 years now, I am excited by the evolution taking place all over the world. I am thrilled to be a part of making this transition easier for people.

My husband and I have been running a vegan catering company for the last 15 years and the feedback we've gotten the most, is that people feel good eating a plant based diet and would live this way if only they could eat the food we cook, everyday! Many people just don't know how to make healthy food tasty...

 

 

Sharing my recipes and lots of useful tips eventually lead me to writing cookbooks. My first vegan cookbook PASSION is now a successful Australian best seller and I can't wait to share HUNGRY! Feeding people and inspiring people to eat well in their busy lives is what fuels me and makes me HUNGRY for life.

This is what the layout looks like

What to expect from HUNGRY cookbook

HUNGRY elevates vegan food to new heights with bold flavour combinations, nourishing versions of all the 'ultimate crave' dishes as well as easy step-by-step instructions. My recipes are inspiringly 100% plant-based, refined sugar free and 95% gluten free. Packed with over 150 simple, organic wholefood recipes using everyday ingredients, including: breakfast, lunch and dinner, and drinks, starters, soups, salads, sweet treats and desserts.

 

 

What does purchasing HUNGRY do?

By purchasing a copy of HUNGRY you'll be helping me to get the word out there that vegan, plant-based food is easy and delicious, as well as promoting a move towards a far more sustainable lifestyle. Going plant-based is one of the simplest but most powerful and effective things you can do as an individual to help reduce environmental devastation! You can live a more peaceful and compassionate life by choosing to love all sentient beings!

 

 

Check out the perks!

For the first 100 supporters we are offering signed copies of HUNGRY at a discounted price!

I also have some other great perks like VIP tickets to my private launch party in Byron Bay with entertainment, featuring food from HUNGRY, book signing and some fun speeches!

 

More Perks!

Also you can give someone you love a bespoke recipe made especially for them by me, promoted on my insta page with bold thank yous and personalised messages from you! Think birthday's, special anniversary's, or declarations of love and adoration!

We are also offering a private party, catered for by us, Organic Passion Catering, for any special occasion you may have coming up. Three courses, saving $1,000 of costs in labour.

 

 

Where do the crowd funds go?

Since PASSION came out I've spent the last 3 years creating new recipes (and some old favourites) and styling and shooting them. I've paid for a professional editor, proof reader and graphic designer (approximately $10,000). The book has gone to print and I've paid $15,000 deposit to set the printing in motion.

So aside from the $25,000 we've spent we need the following: In order to collect the books from the Brisbane docks, I need the remaining $24,190 for the production costs, the 10% Government import GST tax ($4,081), the Port Services fees ($5,000) and transport costs to move 16 pallets of books to my storage unit here in Mullumbimby!

Summary of costs

$24,190 books

$4,081 Govt. tax

$5,000 Port services

$1,600 Transport costs

$3,600 Indiegogo platform fees,

$1,500 Paypal fees & cushion

------------------------------------------------------

$40,000 total

If I raise more than I'm asking for?

If my campaign goes over my asking amount, it will help cover the costs for the VIP Byron Bay launch party ($5,000) and postage costs within the campaign (approximately $4,051). If my campaign doesn't go over then I will obviously be covering these...

So my hope is that if people simply purchase a copy of HUNGRY for themselves, and others as gifts for their friends and family, this will help cover my costs...

 

 

 

 

Thanks for your support!!!

story:
I NEED YOUR HELP! :-)

 

I am raising $55,000 to help other kids and their Mommys & Daddys develop healthy reading rituals because Books are Awesome and so is Reading!!!


”Reading is the gateway skill that makes all other learning possible."
-Barack Obama

 

Where Does the Money Go?

Illustrations- $10,000
I have to finish getting my awesome learning adventure book illustrated by the Amazing Nic Keith, so I can share it with the world. :-) 

Publishing- $5,000
Even though I am self publishing, I still have to get my book formatted and stuff to share with the world.

Design Cost- $5,000
My Mommy and Daddy found A GREAT designer to design my Adventure Chests, Adventure Bags, Literacy Maps, and other materials. 

Adventure Bags- $15,000
Creating Reading Rituals starts at a young age! So we have to get these bags of books in the hands of other Mommys & Daddys.

Adventure Chests- $20,000
I want to to get kids like me excited about reading, and the Adventure Chests are how I am doing it! These chests go into PreK through 3rd grade classrooms. This won't cover every classroom, but you gotta start somewhere, you know. :-)

---

---

 

---

---

Pediatricians Offices and Health Clinics

Calling all Kid Doctors ... we need your help!  If your office or the patients you serve fall within our immediate zone of influence (city of Atlanta), we would like to partner with you! 

Send an email to nicole@empoweredreaders.org to sign up to help us help others!

story:
Bringing The Legacy to the World!

I’m Stasia Morineaux—writer, creator, and ethereal-dreamer. I’ve spent the last several years working on Nine While Nine creating a host of characters, a new mythology, a winding twisting tale, and a world for you to get lost within.

The book—part one in a series—has been perfected with the diligent efforts of a team of highly skilled editors at Parliament House Publishing. But now it’s my turn to take the reins and launch an intensive, worldwide marketing and media blitz!

The publishing game just isn’t what it used to be.

Most book marketing these days falls on the author’s shoulders, even in big publishing companies. Marketing momentum by creating buzz needs to be gained before books are even released.   (Author John Green was able to achieve bestseller status for his book “The Fault In Our Stars” before it was even published!) 

I’ve got all my social media platforms well-covered, but now it’s time to stretch beyond that and dive into print ads, and touring as well.

In this age of publishing, readers want to connect with the author on a more personal level, and the best way to achieve this is with conventions, signings, and various book events.

I need your help with achieving these new goals in making a monumental impact with my proposed worldwide media blitz.

My strategy includes print ads in the highly acclaimed Faerie Magazine, an international publication with a demographic set that is perfect for my brand and is highly visible across all social media platforms.

The blitz will also include attending Book Conventions, Signings, Author Events, and Festivals.

“Readers make or break an author’s success. They write your book reviews and tell their friends how great you and your books are. One single reader can become a valuable connection point to their own larger network, leading their friends back to your books.

As an author, you become the center of your own tribe of readers, and by speaking to them, you lead them on the path toward buying your books.”          **https://www.helpingwritersbecomeauthors.com/aut...

Marketing must go beyond an online presence nowadays. Readers want to mingle and engage with the author, and I’m fully prepared to throw myself into this endeavor 100% with your help!

There are more than 15 events to possibly attend over the next 12 months...in the Carolinas alone!

 

 

What Is This Nine While Nine, You Ask?

Nine While Nine is a dark urban/contemporary fantasy—a modern dark faerie tale—replete with ominous adventure, mystery, dark romanticism, light horror, world-building, and a new mythology.

Isabeau is a seemingly ordinary young woman, living in modern-day suburbia. Until she discovers who she truly is: A Sióg O'Cailleach. A witch of the Fae.

The series chronicles the tumultuous resurgence of the Sióg into the human world, revealing an unprecedented new origin of the Fae, and as a Legacy that was set forth millennia ago comes to fruition, a new war begins to wage, not only in their Realm but spilling over into ours as well. 

Who will be victorious?

Synopsis:

Isabeau Finne’s perfect world utterly unravels when she meets Death's right-hand man one fateful night, spiraling her life into a world of chaos and the impossible. Suddenly, she is no longer Isabeau and becomes part of the most secretive inner-workings of Death itself, as well as an otherworldly dominion of ancient magic.

Now beings—which we were taught as children were merely fictional creations of wildly whimsical minds—are edging their way into her world as well. Buggans and Kobolds and Vargs…oh my!

She yearns for the simplicity of her old life—this one is full of dangers, unanswered questions, and cryptic dreams. After one particularly anomalous dream in which she learns of the Nine While Nine Legacy, things become truly precarious. Now, someone sees her as a risk…a threat…and wants to eliminate her. Fortunately, she falls under the protection of Gideon—unless she leaves his territory—which is the one thing she wants the most…and wants the least.

What's All That Money For, And How Much Do You Need?

Excellent questions! 

I'm looking to reach my goal of $5000. 

The funds would be divvied up to cover various expenses, such as: 

* Blog Tours. To include: more than 25 blogs over one month, tour graphics, media kit, giveaways, daily promos, and more.

* Faerie Magazine Ads. To include: weekly newsletter inclusion for four weeks minimum, website sidebar ad, Facebook ad, and a  1/2 page full-color magazine ad.

* Book/Author Events. To include: table/booth rentals, banner, fees. books, etc...

* Swag for the events. To include: bookmarks, totes, mugs, art cards, etc—to be used for giveaways at signing events and online giveaways.

**If the goal is not completely met, I will divide the money to cover the most beneficial avenues of promotions and marketing. If I exceed my goal, the funds will go towards further ad campaigns and tours.

Other Ways You Can Help!

* You can also help me out by spreading the word. Please let others that might like to take part in the launch and success to drop by! There are 'Share" tools right here on this page!
