story:
Greetings!

(German text follows – Für die deutsche Beschreibung bitte nach unten scrollen. Und unser deutsches Intro Video findet ihr hier!)

This is the literary team of indieberlin speaking. You all know that in the last five or so years, self-publishing has changed rapidly. The whole world of books and publishing has. We need to talk.
That is why we are organizing a fair for self-publishers, in Berlin. November 7 & 8, 2015. Authors can showcase their work, meet others who are doing the same thing, compare notes, and introduce themselves to the public. This is also the chance to team up with editors, cover designers and translators, as well as distributors, so your indie book will become an even better product.
This event is open to the public, and is free.
We also invite book-buyers from bookstores big and small to take advantage of the chance to see so much self-published material in one place, and a chance to meet the authors.
A host of quirky activities with fresh faces and seasoned professionals await, all there to push your boat out: from private reading booths to writer speed dating to shared presentation tables.

We look forward to welcoming you all!

What We Need & What You Get

- 700 euro for a fantastic venue
- 500 euro for lovely indie catering
- 400 euro for insurances, safety
- 300 euro for setup, audio-visual equipment hire
- 400 euro as compensation for our time/ other people's time on a minimum wage basis
 - 400 euro for advertising or marketing materials/costs
Altogether around 3000 Euros. The more we get, the more we're going to offer, in terms of activities and fun stuff.

Und jetzt nochmal auf Deutsch: Willkommen! Also was wollen wir???

Die Literatur-Redaktion von indieberlin stellt im November 2015 in Berlin eine „Messe“ für Self-Publisher auf die Beine, und für all diejenigen, die dabei helfen können, ein selbst veröffentlichtes Buch besser und professioneller zu machen, also freie Lektoren, Korrektoren, Cover-Designer, Übersetzer und natürlich auch Publikations- und Distributions-Dienstleister. Außerdem laden wir die Einkäufer von Buchhandlungen jeglicher Größe ein, sich ein Bild von der Vielfalt und Qualität selbst verlegter Bücher zu machen, und mit den Autoren ins Gespräch zu kommen, einzukaufen, etc.

Wir nennen das Ganze bewusst einen „Spielplatz,“ denn wir wollen weg von Frontalunterricht und den immer gleichen Vorträgen. Wir wollen unsere Ideen auf der Hüpfburg tanzen und springen lassen, ganz tief im Sand der Möglichkeiten buddeln, hoch in den Himmel schaukeln, einfach mal alle Träume von der Leine lassen…

Und Menschen zusammenbringen, die Bücher machen, lesen, schreiben, gestalten oder verkaufen. Von Privatlesungen im Beichtstuhl über Blind Dates mit möglichen Partnern fürs nächste Buch bis zum Marketing-Brainstorming in großer Runde planen wir Aktivitäten, die alle Beteiligten inspirieren und auf ihrem Weg weiterbringen sollen.

Also sei dabei!
Was brauchen wir? Und was bekommst du für deine Unterstützung?

- 700 Euro für einen großartigen Veranstaltungsort
- 500 Euro für liebevoll zubereitetes Essen
- 400 Euro für Versicherung, Sicherheit vor Ort
- 300 Euro für Technik und Aufbau
- 400 Euro als Aufwandsentschädigung für die Organisatoren auf Mindestlohnbasis
- 400 Euro für Werbung/Marketing
Also insgesamt um die 3000 Euro, um das Ding auf die Beine zu stellen. Je mehr wir bekommen, desto mehr können wir euch auf der "Messe" bieten!

story:
Slowly, the stars above New York City swam into focus. At that moment, the Wayfarer was born. Awakening from some timeless dream, the nameless man found himself on the roof of a rundown brownstone, staring inexplicably up at the benighted skies.

Something in the bright web woven by those glittering lights held him. There was a familiarity about the constellations overhead; a nearly forgotten fragment of memory that tugged at his mind but, strangely, refused to yield any clear recollection.

Unknown were the events of the past, he realized. The stargazer knew only the present and understood instinctively that there was a future yet to come. There was no past, at least none that he could clearly recall. The answers were trapped in his mind; he could sense them locked in his thoughts, but they were a confused jumble, an incoherent maelstrom of scrambled data.

He did not know where he had been or what he had done but he somehow suspected that he had been far and done a great deal. It was a moment of surety in a chaotic world. He knew he was a wanderer, a traveler who had been farther than any man before him. Where that was, he did not know but he could see flashes of something strange and wonderful… and terrifying.....

Hi. I 'm Gomer Robinson. I'm here today to talk about the culmination of a creative endeavour I began a long time ago.

Over two decades ago, on a battered old computer with no hard-drive that needed its shareware word processor booted up each time it was turned on, I wrote a novel. Mundane life got in the way back then but it has survived on floppy disks and the hard-drives of subsequent machines until the present day.

A while back, encouraged by my wife, I brushed away the digital dust and began the process of putting it into a state of final editing.

Now, I am preparing to take the next step and self-publish the manuscript I wrote.

You just heard the first few opening paragraphs of that story and I hope it has piqued your interest.

It is the tale of a journey from an intense and turbulent future of broken memories and shadowy multinational corporations controlling governments, into a muddled past of anguish and tragedy where civil unrest begins a bloody revolution in the boroughs of a sprawling metropolis. It details a search to find out who the Wayfarer really is and where his place lies between a kid from the streets and the enigmatic man with abilities both awe-inspiring and terrifying that he has become. To accomplish this, he must also unravel the truth of his connections to a cunning and resourceful foe who seems to hold all the cards. It is a quest that takes two men and their rivalry to a world of billionaire puppeteers and reaching out to destinations far beyond. Throughout this voyage of discovery, one woman becomes the fulcrum upon which the truth teeters and it is her determination that helps unlock secrets that none of them might expect.

I could really use your help in making this all come to fruition. I have begun a crowd-funding campaign to fully realize this dream. It's a dream whose final goal has always been about being able to share this story with others.

If you wish to contribute to this project. You can do so in more than one way. You can contribute funds to help with the publishing and marketing costs and receive perks for doing so in the form of digital or signed hard-copies. You can also contribute just by passing along word of this campaign through social media or even word of mouth.

Any and all contributions will be appreciated greatly and with much gratitude.

i believe many of you know I am an author of a book titled Redefining God: Hope Restored. My wish is to have it printed in bulk and be made available to many people at no fee or a very low fee to keep the printing going. I currently have no or less budget for its print and I would like to ask for your assistance in anyway. I believe the book is not ready for profit since people aren’t much used to or familiar with its content therefore there is a need for awareness.
I am currently trying to generate funds through the kindle version sold at 7$ and the royalties are sure very small and I am hoping you guys can keep buying it; the difference will be of great help to many.  Your donation is very critical in reaching the objective.
Looking forward to your assistance
Your brother in Christ

story:
Summary

My husband name is Mikhail. He is 27 years old. He is disabled. 

October 7, 2013 the roof repairing broken the loop on a climbing harness and he fell off the roof of the house. The blow he had stopped breathing, but his managed to reanimate. He got serious injuries: fracture of the spine Tr9-10, kidney injury, cracked rib, a bruised lung (breathing was difficult, installed drainage and lowered liquid), cranial trauma.

He had the surgery and He have dreamed of for years to stand up, but not all dreams come true.

April 28, 2015, he became a father. I gave birth to him wonderful son. His life has changed, it is highly accelerated, concern has increased. He took the part of the household responsibilities. He first time in 1.5 years ceased to to think about what he in a wheelchair, he just live on and pleased lives.

This summer, my husband was at a camp for disabled people in wheelchairs. He spent 10 days wheelchairs active type. My husband came back happy and cheerful, he is the first time in two years, was walking through the city on their own.

Six months after the injury friends gave us old wheelchair. But this was not a problem until he moved in the house, the defect does not affect his actions. But now every day he drives 5 km (until the good weather and no rain):

  • he wheelchair is very wide (42 cm), and he need 39, so his hands are constantly separated the sides and difficult to move around;
  • low seat, he need to use two cushions to sit properly and there was no extra load on the bones and skin;
  • wheelchair was more than 9 years old, it was awful creaking. When he moved down from the curb or call in on the curb, I am afraid that it would collapse under him;
  • the main defect in her deformed frame. Wheelchair constantly goes to the left, so he have to slow down the right wheel or in addition trying to turn left to go straight. It's very difficult. (He checked the rear wheels, they are good, he have replaced the bearings in all wheelchair, everything revolves as expected, but the problem remained, so the most likely problem is defect in the frame).

The new wheelchair will help him move freely, doing sports, dancing. Will no problems walking with our son walking in the park or zoo. Wheelchair replace our feet, everyone wants to walk in comfortable shoes, no one wants to wear shoes that are too tight and make the wound.

If each visitor campaign will leave at least 1 euro, we will be at 1 euro closer to the goal.

We sincerely hope for your help and support.

"Every little helps to prevent the earth from disaster."


What we need and what you get

Experienced wheelchair advise Swiss wheelchair KÜSCHALL R33 (http://www.kueschall.ch/en/Active-wheelchairs/R...). It has very simple and reliable design.

Our disability organizations will help with making the order and our friends will help with delivery to Belarus.

The cost of a wheelchair is 3150-3200 euros depending on its’ size and configuration (http://doclibrary.invacare.be/Office/Europe/Mar...).

For a fee 300-400 EUR (depending on size), it will be possible to buy a cushion for wheelchair (https://roho.com/).

"ROHO® wheelchair seat cushions provide the pressure relief needed. ROHO’s unique design allows the seat cushion to constantly adjust to a individual's body movement. The adjustment and conformity of the cells accommodate and meet the one-of-a-kind skin integrity needs for each client throughout the day." (C) (https://roho.com/category/products/cushions/).


The Impact

A wheelchair is a continuation of the body, it is the vehicle and the legs at the same time. So it is important to use a wheelchair of correct size. After all, no one likes to walk in the shoes that are too tight or large, it's not nice.

In our country unfortunately the infrastructure for wheelchair users (high curbs, often do not have access ramps, etc.) is poorly developed. To move around the city, such person needs to be strong and agile.

Comfortable and well-chosen wheelchair facilitates movement.


Risks and Challenges

My goal is to collect the necessary sum of money, and even if I do not succeed the first time, I will not stop. It may take a little longer, but I will.


Other ways you can help

I will be very grateful for any help. Please repost my campaign.

Thank you very much!

story:
About "The Green Cookbook"

If you’ve always thought that cannabis edibles had to be difficult and time-consuming to make, or if you’re tired of the same old “special” brownies and teas, you’ll be thrilled to discover that there are a number of easy recipes included in The Green Cookbook that are ideal for anyone who is just getting started cooking with cannabis, as well as a host of original and inventive concoctions that are sure to thrill even the pickiest palates. 

Eating vegan cannabis edibles is an excellent way to get your daily dose of marijuana and to eat more responsibly as you do it.  A vegan diet is better for both you and the environment and best of all, it doesn’t require the suffering of another living being to provide you with sustenance.  When you use The Green Cookbook to prepare your meals, you can rest assured that you are doing what is right not only for your body, but for the rest of the world too.

The Green Cookbook is full of fun and easy recipes for all kinds of tasty dishes, including breakfast meals, convenient snacks and indulgent desserts, as well as unique drinks that will satisfy your thirst and your need for weed at the same time. This is one cannabis cookbook that you’ll never tire of using, thanks to the wide variety of vegan offerings included in its pages.


This Campaign's Goal

With this campaign we want to gather the necessary funds to create a second volume to The Green Cookbook. 

Our intention is to put together another 101 recipes with the same focus on deliciousness, diverse flavors and ingredients, easiness of cooking and love for our herb of all herb, cannabis.

And for this, you can be of great help.


Perks and Support

The $1 USD, $5 USD, $10 USD and $15 USD perks
As you can see from the descriptions on the right these three perks are pretty straightforward. You will receive either the already written first volume of The Green Cookbook or both the first volume and the future second volume.

The $25 USD perk
Besides receiving both volumes for this perk you will also receive a personal 'Thank you!' video message from us acknowledging your support and love for the project.  We will record an individual video message for everyone that chooses this perk.

The $250 USD perk
This perk is mostly aimed for individuals or businesses that have an ongoing activity that relates to cannabis and that want to promote it inside the book. An A4 page will be available for this. You will send us the advertising text and/or images. No racial or sexual materials will be accepted. ONLY 12 such pages will be reserved for this.

The businesses will also be promoted on Sativis's website, Facebook page and Twitter account.

Support without perks
As helpful as perks are, there is an equal way in which you can help bring this volume to life. 

Share this campaign with your friends and family in any way you can. Post it on Facebook or Google+, tweet it on Twitter, buzz your fellow Tumblr or Instagram followers about it or hey!, use that old dusty email. The more people see the campaign, the more chances there are to gather the necessary funds.

Funds Usage

Our plan is to use 2/3 of the funds on buying the necessary cannabis and other food ingredients for the recipes. Also, on electricity, gas and other utilities bills that are directly related to the production of the book. The more funds we gather, the cheaper the cannabis will be because we will be buying it in bulk, so we will be able to negotiate a discounted price, directly at the producer. 

The other 1/3 of the funds will be used for promoting the eBook. We intend to promote it online mainly on blogs, websites, Facebook and Twitter pages and YouTube channels of cannabis advocates that help educate and spread true knowledge about the herb. Only by supporting and giving back to the cannabis community we, together, can grow and create a new and greener world. 

So then, what happens if we don't reach our campaign funding goal?

We will still create this eBook, but it will take much longer. We estimate that at least 12 months. If we do reach our goal then the eBook will be ready in 30 to 45 days. 

Thank you!

Thank you very much for having the patience to read about this campaign and in hopes that together we can sprout and grow a beautiful project, please do not forget to share it with the people around you.
http://igg.me/at/the-green-cookbook-second-volume

Love and light!

story:
The Chronicles of Caylor

My name is Alan Farber, I am 49 years old, single, and work as a general laborer in an electronics manufacturer in Indiana, from which I am on temporary layoff. I have also driven eighteen-wheelers in 47 states, managed restaurants, been an FM radio country DJ, and a golden-oldies AM radio DJ.

One thing that has followed me all my life is my love of reading, and a desire to write. I have been working on a story for many years now, and have finally reached the point where it is ready for publication. I have researched the needed steps many times, and am fully aware of the actions I need to perform to publish on my own, as well as the costs. Now all I need is your help to get my story to the masses.

Why publish on my own, and not submit the book to Tor, or another fantasy publisher? Firstly, so that I know it will be printed. Many submissions, no matter how good, are not printed because they may conflict with one already being published, or because the editor who was given the book to review it didn't like it. Secondly, to retain control of the work, of course. Once you sell your first book to a publisher, they will take over all the aspects of it: editing, formatting, and cover. They will cut out anything they think is not pertinent to the plot to save printing costs. They can revise it into something that hardly resembles my original. They will put it out in what size they want, not what I'd like - it could end up as a cheap 6" x 9" floppy-cover with a cartoon on the cover. And in the end, I'll earn only what they paid me when I sold it to them.

"The Chronicles of Caylor" is a five-book series of fantasy/fiction, loosely based on a long-running adventure of my friends through a Dungeons & Dragons campaign created by myself. It concerns four adventurers who come together, not knowing each other, and begin their careers.

The series is entitled "The Chronicles of Caylor." There are five books: "The Thule Tower," "The Seethia Tower," "The Malvera Tower," "The Hastur Tower," and "The Celestial Tower."

The first book is now complete, and needs editing, proofing, a cover, promoted, and published. It is 82,226 words, which is approximately 270 pages in trade-paperback size.


The story - Four adventurers are hired by the Guild to investigate the death of several workers in the Stillmire Swamp: Morganna, a female mage with a strong will and a short temper, and a disregard for good, evil, or any kind of balance between the two, and who finds rules a hindrance; Giovanna, a female ranger, shy and quiet, with a deep regard for nature and balance, and a fear of risk; Lance, a male cleric of Thor, with a natural tendency toward good and lawfulness, as well as leadership; and Frizzle, a male gnome illusionist and thief, who seems to embody chaos and risk.

Once the four companions discover and eliminate the foul creature that killed the workers, they discover a mist-enshrouded tower deep in the swamp. Investigating the tower, they find themselves fighting the animated remains of animals and men, before even entering the lone tower, and nearly end their adventures there. After asking for help from their mentors and trainers, they return to the tower, and defeat the recently risen undead. The object that had caused the undead to rise is forgotten, though, once they enter the tower and discover its peculiarities and mysteries; such as the ground floor has no stairs leading upward, yet from the outside they can see there is a window far above. Before long, they discover the secret to reaching the second floor, which holds yet another puzzle. Finally gaining the top floor, finding more mysteries and dangers along the way, they find the strangest mystery of all: four mirrors, each showing a different land and season. Stepping through the mirrors takes them to towers of identical design, but differing in furnishings and location, and each with their own risks and dangers. They again require the help of their superiors. After much study, their mentors announce that there is yet more to be learned about the towers, and that they are on the verge of an incredible discovery. The mentors return to the city for further research - but end up dying under very mysterious circumstances. Now, the four adventurers are left on their own to explore the remaining towers.

The reader will find hints that the adventurers are still not working alone, and are not only being closely watched, but secretly aided and hindered as well. In this first book, only vague hints are given, and the adventurers remain completely ignorant. In the first book, nothing is revealed about who the mysterious person(s) is, or why they are watching, and sometimes interfering with the group. Each book will reveal a small amount of information about this person(s), and the members of the group begin to suspect, but only in the fifth book will the truth be revealed, and the adventurers know.

Each of the novels follows the adventurers as they explore one of the towers and its surrounding areas, complete with strange and unique  peoples, cities, creatures, and dangers. After exploring the four towers, they discover there is a fifth tower, with a magical ability they scarcely believe, and located in a place that cannot possibly be. And only then will they discover that they have been watched, aided, and hindered, by the unknown entity from the very beginning. It is then that they discover that the forgotten object from the beginning of their adventures holds the key to victory, and the safety of their entire world. Now, if Frizzle could only remember where he sold it...

The novels follow the adventurers as they grow closer, wiser, and stronger. Each character is developed along the way, revealing their backgrounds, and their feelings for each other as they change. There is a bit of romance, a bit of rivalry, and a lot of action, as four very different personas learn to work together to survive.


What I Need & What You Get

Your donations will be used to perform the following tasks on "The Chronicles of Caylor: Book One - The Thule Tower":

  • Proofing and editing.
  • Formatting and creation of the EPUB and Kindle editions.
  • Formatting and printing of the first run of the print edition.
  • Promotion and advertising to retailers and online outlets for all versions - EPUB, Kindle, and print.
  • Aside from the possible Perks, when you donate any amount, you will receive your choice of the final book in one of the following formats: EPUB, Mobi/Kindle, PDF, or Word document. (You must request the book after donating, tell me which format you prefer, and an email where it can be sent. If you are willing to pay the shipping, I will send you a print copy when they are available.)

The costs your donation will cover are as follows:

  • Editing costs range from $.02 to $.10 per word, depending on the quality of the editor. At $.05 per word at 82,226 words, that comes to just over $4,000, though most editors will charge a smaller sum for complete works already fee of basic mistakes, which this book is. If the amount raised allows for the best, that is what I will get. Otherwise, I will have it done for less by less competent and less known editors.
  • The formatting and creation of the EPUB and Kindle versions can be done for less than $300 for both.
  • The formatting of the print version varies, but is generally between $200 and $1,000. Going by the size of my book and the ready condition of the text, it should be less than $500.
  • The printing costs of the physical print books can vary quite widely. On-Demand publishers can be very cheap, but produce very cheap products. Exactly what printing option is used will depend on how much is raised, and will vary from simple formatting for a few initial books printed for around $1,000, to polished and professional work on one thousand books for around $4,000.
  • Advertising and promotional costs also vary considerably. They can run from simple e-flyers sent to a few online stores and physical retailers for a few hundred dollars, to full-color promotional leaflets mailed to most online booksellers and retailers running into the thousands of dollars. I will use the funds left over from the previous steps to get the very best exposure possible.
  • At all stages, I will not spend the entirety of the donations, and leave the book in limbo. If only enough is raised to do the most basic and inexpensive work in each stage, that is what will be done. If, on the other hand, donations are enough, only the best will be contracted.
  • If funding is less than $4,000, likely only the ebook versions will be published, promoted for now, though a print version will be print-ready, and sales of the ebooks will fund the printing and promotion of the print version.
  • If funding is less than $2,000 the ebooks will be edited, published, and promoted, and sales of the ebooks (hopefully) pay for the print version to be set-up, promoted, and printed.

Bonuses

There are several bonuses to funding my project:
  • The first book is already finished, you will be funding a completed book, not waiting for one to (hopefully) be written.
  • A preview of the book is available, so you can see what the style and quality is before you donate: Preview
  • I have already copyrighted and obtained an ISBN for the first book.
  • I have already obtained the cover artwork.
  • I have already purchased the domain name chroniclesofcaylor.com, obtained hosting, and set up a web page for the release of the book. I have also pre-ordered the domain name chroniclesofcaylor.book.
  • Your donation can be considered pre-ordering a book if you wish, and not just donating, as you can request a finished ebook version after donating. Just ask for one in the format of your choice: EPUB/EBOOK, Mobi/Kindle, or PDF, and when the version you requested is finalized I will send you a copy. (Please see the Perks section as well)
  • The second book is already written, though it is still undergoing final revision. The third through fifth books are already written in rough form, needing only to be revised to match changes in the previously finished books as they are completed.
  • As the book finishes each stage, I will update here with the expenses. You will know where the money is going.

story:
I served and made a career as a U.S. Marine, in many varied arenas that allowed me to gain considerable experience in my life. I thoroughly enjoy telling stories, that relate to my experiences. The literary world allows me to express my creativity and fictionalize my story. I want to share with you, that what I tell can exist somewhere in this world. I want you with me, as my main character must counter these heinous militia, that have no respect for human life.

I need your help. I need you as a part of my team. I will share with you if you will share with me. "Terrorist Quest for Power" is my first manuscript for publication. I need funds to publish and promote my novel. With your fingerprints supporting this phase of the process, I will be able to get the finished story before you and all of your friends. This is no small task, if I want it right. Of course I do. I'm asking you and all your friends, to use your valuable time reading the story that I created. It must be first class for you.

The professionals need to edit, which is a big hunk of the cost, I spent considerable amount of time going over my writing and editing myself. The professionals know the market and are far more objective with my work.

The printing is "on demand" these days, and the options will be in e-book or paperback. It is easy to see the editing and marketing are the major cost segments to getting the book to you.

I must meet my goal of $5,000 to just meet my minimal needs to get the book to the market. I really need twice that amount to have the very best publish and promote my novel. I have been accepted by several publishers that want my business. It is really up to you. Everything in excess of that goal will assure greater success of the publication. I need your support. 

Based on critics with first class publishers that have read my book, "Terrorist Quest for Power", is an excellent read that challenges the interest of the reader to continue to the end. It is full of action and interesting characters that are challenged by the unexpected.

I am planning to write additional stories with my main character, Tom Murphy if we meet reasonable success with the first. Hopefully the book will pay costs for future publications.

Thank you my literary friend for participating and I look forward to writing for you in the future as well.

Campaign Over - Contact Us on Facebook

This campaign has ended but if you are interested in our story or trying to still get a book please go to "In Memory of Seth James Maceyko" on Facebook and you can contact us there.  Send us an email there and we will respond!  


Check us out on the 10TV Columbus links below for video:

For the video about how and why our message was born (as seen on 10TV):

http://bit.ly/1MLjijn  (this link goes to 10TV.com for their copyrighted video)

And to watch the video about the red cardinal (and the significance of the pretty bird):

http://www.10tv.com/content/sections/video/index.html?video=/videos/2015/07/23/snuggle-time-story.xml 


What Exactly is Seth's Snuggle Time and Where Did It Come From?

On March 20, 2013 my five year old son, Seth James Maceyko, died in an accident.  I remember how difficult it was to sleep those first several days and it was during one of those early mornings that I awoke with thoughts flooding my head about my child.  The images in my mind were so vivid and clear that it seemed as if I was re-living moments of my life all over again.  I went to Seth’s Facebook page (In Memory of Seth James Maceyko) and wrote the following:

Seth’s Snuggle Time

Every night Seth would ask me one question. Every single night it was the same question. It didn’t matter if he was playing with his toys, watching TV or whatever else he may have been doing – right around 9 pm he would ask me his question and he expected me to play his game. The exchange would go like this:

Seth: “Do you know what time it is?”

Me: “Time for you to get a job?”

Seth: “No.”

Me: “Time for you to clean your room?”

Seth: “Noooo!!!!!!!.”

And we would continue back and forth until I responded with the correct “Is it Snuggle Time?” Seth would then give a resounding “YES” and he would climb up on my lap, snuggle up against his daddy and stay that way until he fell asleep. This happened every night. Snuggle time was the highlight of my day and I believe it was Seth’s as well. Snuggle time in our home meant hugs, kisses, and unconditional love. Snuggle time completed another day for us and allowed Seth to give and receive love, have a sense of security, and get the attention of his daddy to end his day. Snuggle time was pure. Snuggle time was open and honest. Snuggle time completed us. It didn’t matter if I was reading, watching TV, browsing Facebook or anything else. When I heard “Do you know what time it is?” The world stopped so I could have snuggle time with my son.

Now I no longer will get to hear that question. Snuggle time with Seth has come to an end but at least I experienced it. Some people drink alcohol, do drugs, or find another way to experience a high. Snuggle time replaced any need for that. There was no better high than holding that child in your arms and receiving his little hugs and kisses and hearing “I love you daddy” to finish your day. So I ask all of you, “Do you know what time it is?” It’s a game that we all need to play more often. Maybe instead of having play station - if we replaced it with “Do you know what time it is?” the world would be a better place. Maybe children would grow up with less hate in their heart. Maybe there would be less violence. Maybe there would be more kindness. Maybe we all would feel a little more fulfilled. Through all of this pain I at least can rest assured that Seth knew he was loved and I knew that I was loved in return. Both of us knew the answer before the question was asked. In our world it was always snuggle time. Now ask yourself, “Do you know what time it is?”

The Story Went Viral

That story reached over 199,000 people through Seth's Facebook page as others shared it all over the nation and it became clear to me that despite my own personal pain I had a message that needed to be shared with the world.  Seth’s Snuggle Time story was a way that I could keep my son alive and maybe change some other lives in the process.  Maybe if other people heard Seth’s story they could re-examine their own relationships with their children.  Are they spending enough snuggle time with their kids?  Are they truly valuing the time they have with their children?  We all get so caught up in this fast-paced way of life that time passes us by and before we know it our kids are gone.  For most of us that means that they simply grew up, but for others that loss may have come too early.  Either way none of us get to keep our kids as toddlers forever.

So I began sharing Seth’s Snuggle Time story and I am happy to report that one thing led to another and after a two year journey “SJ the Monkey” was born!  SJ is the main character in our children’s book called "Seth's Snuggle Time Game."  The hope is that parents and children can read the book together, share the message of love and develop their own nightly ritual.

SJ the Monkey

Here is a picture of our main character in the book - "SJ the Monkey":


Why Support This Project? 

Every so often in life a message comes along that has the potential to make a huge impact and this children's picture book undoubtedly has the ability to do just that. We strongly believe that SJ the Monkey can help change the world - one hug at a time.  However, we need you to join us in order to make "Seth's Snuggle Time Game" come alive.  Our goal is to make this into a Snuggle Time Movement that not only entertains but also educates. That's why the story in our children's book ends with SJ the Monkey telling the readers how to play his game!  He literally teaches kids (and parents) how to play the Snuggle Time game thus encouraging parents and kids to spend quality time together snuggling - the way it was meant to be!  Think about all of those kids out in the world who aren't getting their daily dose of attention from their parents.  What if we can change that?  What if we can open the eyes of those parents?  What if we could literally teach children how to get their parents to play the game?  How much better would our world be if there was more love and more Snuggle Time? 

Where Does the Money Go?

The $9,100 being asked for will cover Professional Services (illustrator, editing) and Trademarking costs and Publishing of First Edition Books.  These will be hardcover editions!  Everything we raise will go towards upgrading the books and/or getting more copies upfront as well as launching our website for this project. 

Is the Book Professionally Illustrated?

Yes!  We took our time and did this book right.  It was professionally illustrated and well written.  Professional editors have reviewed the book and we have worked with people who have many years of experience in this field.   This message is too important for us to take any short cuts - so we didn't!  It wasn't cheap, but with a message this important it had to be done right. 

When will the Book go to Print?

The story is 100% complete so once we meet our fundraising goal we will be sending the book out for the first round of printing.  Our current goal is to have first edition copies physically in hand ready to distribute this coming fall (before the holidays- fingers crossed) and EBook versions ready even sooner!  

What Does the Future Hold for Us?

SJ the Monkey is intended to spread his special message of Snuggle Time to everyone around the world and so if things go well we hope to launch the book in the USA and then put it into other languages and distribute it around the world!  We also hope that eventually a second SJ the Monkey book will be created.   We also have a goal of creating SJ the Monkey plushies, a phone app/game, music and much more. We will be launching our very own website in the coming months as well.  Our true goal is to get as many people as possible to join us and promote this message of love through the precious moments we call Snuggle Time.  What would the world be like if a million people were moved enough to begin their own nightly snuggle time ritual? The possibilities are limitless so join us today as we change the world through "Seth's Snuggle Time Game" - one hug at a time! 

This campaign is just the start of our movement and we want to thank each and every one of you for taking the time to read through this and/or contribute and sponsor our campaign.  As we've said before we think Seth's Snuggle Time Game can change the world and with people like you helping us we will do exactly that - one hug at a time!
story_txt: Campaign Over - Contact Us on FacebookThis campaign has ended but if you are interested in our story or trying to still get a book please go to "In Memory of Seth James Maceyko" on Facebook and you can contact us there.  Send us an email there and we will respond!  Check us out on the 10TV Columbus links below for video:For the video about how and why our message was born (as seen on 10TV):http://bit.ly/1MLjijn  (this link goes to 10TV.com for their copyrighted video)And to watch the video about the red cardinal (and the significance of the pretty bird):http://www.10tv.com/content/sections/video/index.html?video=/videos/2015/07/23/snuggle-time-story.xml What Exactly is Seth's Snuggle Time and Where Did It Come From?On March 20, 2013 my five year old son, Seth James Maceyko, died in an accident.  I remember how difficult it was to sleep those first several days and it was during one of those early mornings that I awoke with thoughts flooding my head about my child.  The images in my mind were so vivid and clear that it seemed as if I was re-living moments of my life all over again.  I went to Seth’s Facebook page (In Memory of Seth James Maceyko) and wrote the following:Seth’s Snuggle TimeEvery night Seth would ask me one question. Every single night it was the same question. It didn’t matter if he was playing with his toys, watching TV or whatever else he may have been doing – right around 9 pm he would ask me his question and he expected me to play his game. The exchange would go like this:Seth: “Do you know what time it is?”Me: “Time for you to get a job?”Seth: “No.”Me: “Time for you to clean your room?”Seth: “Noooo!!!!!!!.”And we would continue back and forth until I responded with the correct “Is it Snuggle Time?” Seth would then give a resounding “YES” and he would climb up on my lap, snuggle up against his daddy and stay that way until he fell asleep. This happened every night. Snuggle time was the highlight of my day and I believe it was Seth’s as well. Snuggle time in our home meant hugs, kisses, and unconditional love. Snuggle time completed another day for us and allowed Seth to give and receive love, have a sense of security, and get the attention of his daddy to end his day. Snuggle time was pure. Snuggle time was open and honest. Snuggle time completed us. It didn’t matter if I was reading, watching TV, browsing Facebook or anything else. When I heard “Do you know what time it is?” The world stopped so I could have snuggle time with my son.Now I no longer will get to hear that question. Snuggle time with Seth has come to an end but at least I experienced it. Some people drink alcohol, do drugs, or find another way to experience a high. Snuggle time replaced any need for that. There was no better high than holding that child in your arms and receiving his little hugs and kisses and hearing “I love you daddy” to finish your day. So I ask all of you, “Do you know what time it is?” It’s a game that we all need to play more often. Maybe instead of having play station - if we replaced it with “Do you know what time it is?” the world would be a better place. Maybe children would grow up with less hate in their heart. Maybe there would be less violence. Maybe there would be more kindness. Maybe we all would feel a little more fulfilled. Through all of this pain I at least can rest assured that Seth knew he was loved and I knew that I was loved in return. Both of us knew the answer before the question was asked. In our world it was always snuggle time. Now ask yourself, “Do you know what time it is?”The Story Went ViralThat story reached over 199,000 people through Seth's Facebook page as others shared it all over the nation and it became clear to me that despite my own personal pain I had a message that needed to be shared with the world.  Seth’s Snuggle Time story was a way that I could keep my son alive and maybe change some other lives in the process.  Maybe if other people heard Seth’s story they could re-examine their own relationships with their children.  Are they spending enough snuggle time with their kids?  Are they truly valuing the time they have with their children?  We all get so caught up in this fast-paced way of life that time passes us by and before we know it our kids are gone.  For most of us that means that they simply grew up, but for others that loss may have come too early.  Either way none of us get to keep our kids as toddlers forever.So I began sharing Seth’s Snuggle Time story and I am happy to report that one thing led to another and after a two year journey “SJ the Monkey” was born!  SJ is the main character in our children’s book called "Seth's Snuggle Time Game."  The hope is that parents and children can read the book together, share the message of love and develop their own nightly ritual.SJ the MonkeyHere is a picture of our main character in the book - "SJ the Monkey":Why Support This Project?  Every so often in life a message comes along that has the potential to make a huge impact and this children's picture book undoubtedly has the ability to do just that.  We strongly believe that SJ the Monkey can help change the world - one hug at a time.  However, we need you to join us in order to make "Seth's Snuggle Time Game" come alive.  Our goal is to make this into a Snuggle Time Movement that not only entertains but also educates. That's why the story in our children's book ends with SJ the Monkey telling the readers how to play his game!  He literally teaches kids (and parents) how to play the Snuggle Time game thus encouraging parents and kids to spend quality time together snuggling - the way it was meant to be!  Think about all of those kids out in the world who aren't getting their daily dose of attention from their parents.  What if we can change that?  What if we can open the eyes of those parents?  What if we could literally teach children how to get their parents to play the game?  How much better would our world be if there was more love and more Snuggle Time?  Where Does the Money Go?The $9,100 being asked for will cover Professional Services (illustrator, editing) and Trademarking costs and Publishing of First Edition Books.  These will be hardcover editions!  Everything we raise will go towards upgrading the books and/or getting more copies upfront as well as launching our website for this project.  Is the Book Professionally Illustrated?Yes!  We took our time and did this book right.  It was professionally illustrated and well written.  Professional editors have reviewed the book and we have worked with people who have many years of experience in this field.   This message is too important for us to take any short cuts - so we didn't!  It wasn't cheap, but with a message this important it had to be done right. When will the Book go to Print?The story is 100% complete so once we meet our fundraising goal we will be sending the book out for the first round of printing.  Our current goal is to have first edition copies physically in hand ready to distribute this coming fall (before the holidays- fingers crossed) and EBook versions ready even sooner!  What Does the Future Hold for Us?SJ the Monkey is intended to spread his special message of Snuggle Time to everyone around the world and so if things go well we hope to launch the book in the USA and then put it into other languages and distribute it around the world!  We also hope that eventually a second SJ the Monkey book will be created.   We also have a goal of creating SJ the Monkey plushies, a phone app/game, music and much more. We will be launching our very own website in the coming months as well.  Our true goal is to get as many people as possible to join us and promote this message of love through the precious moments we call Snuggle Time.  What would the world be like if a million people were moved enough to begin their own nightly snuggle time ritual? The possibilities are limitless so join us today as we change the world through "Seth's Snuggle Time Game" - one hug at a time! This campaign is just the start of our movement and we want to thank each and every one of you for taking the time to read through this and/or contribute and sponsor our campaign.  As we've said before we think Seth's Snuggle Time Game can change the world and with people like you helping us we will do exactly that - one hug at a time!

story:
I am Frank J. Matthews, a Marine Corps. Veteran of WWII.  At the age of 18, I carried a flame thrower during the battle of Iwo Jima. Only one member of my platoon survived those 33 days of hell on earth and this year I reached the age of 89. While I share the history of my brothers who didn't make it back through my public work as a docent at the Museum of the Marine Corps. and by various speaking engagements, I also want to ensure that the next generation never forgets.

      My Family is raising money for me to take my story and book on a tour to bases and museums around the country. Please help us to spread the story of my fallen soldiers and I.

       In the book You Don't Know Jack, you can enjoy the emotional and sometimes funny stories of my journey through the trials and triumphs of the Marine Corp both during and post war time.

Me at Age 18 Just after Iwo Jima

Me now at age 89, Docent at the Marine Corps museum at Quantico VA

Lets be perfectly Frank:

No I did not meet Hitler while I was on Iwo Jima.  He was on a ski trip on the other side of the island.  I am not making this up - I've been asked!  Who will make sure the next generation knows of the sacrifices made so that they could live in a free world? My own grandson asked me a question during a visit to the Gettysburg Battlefield:  "Papa Jack this must be so emotional for you - can you remember where you were?"  More marines died on Iwo Jima than in all of the Gulf Wars combined.

(And no, I did not fight during the civil war).

Getting to know Frank

Let me express the overwhelming feelings the war inflicted on my brothers and me.  One thing helped me find some solace where none was to be found:  music. 

By the grace of God, the circumstances of my life led me to learn to play and to compose music.  I was able to share this with my brothers after the battle when I played for religious services on a portable pump organ.  I was also able to give composition to my experiences and emotions by writing music during the war.  This is a skill I learned early in my life.  This is a skill that saved me in just as many ways as my Marine Corps training did.  Back then we didn't have a term or treatment for PTSD. 

You can also help by going to our FaceBook page or Website about Frank J. Matthews.

Short Summary

I am Mike Ogunwale, an author from Africa with a great passion to inspire creative revolution. The inability of many people to tap into their inner resources has been a major reason why many lag behind in pursuit of a more fulfilling and rewarding life. This was my inspiration while I wrote the book, Developing Mental Ascent. It is a book that inspires, instructs and motivates people to take creative steps in turning their lives around and turn their business ideas into beautiful realities. Reviewed and endorsed by a number of Bestseller authors including Marshall Goldsmith, World's #1 Executive Coach and author of the #1 New York Times Bestseller, Triggers. 

This inspirational book is to be published next January in the United States and I need your support to turn the book idea into an amazing success. 


What We Need & What You Get

  • We require $8,500 (US) to publish this book which has received world class reviews.
  • What do you get? You will be the first to get the hardcopies of the book once it is finally out of the press by March 2016. Plus I will be giving you an e-book for your contribution.
  • Your partnership on this project is most required to make it a huge success.


Risks & Challenges

The challenge here is being able to get the word of this campaign out there and noise it abroad in order to attract and achieve the desired success.

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond your donation and pre-order of the book, there are other ways you can help. Kindly help to spread the word among your friends and family and make some noise about this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools. 

Your contribution will be an encouragement to do more.

Please use the Swedish version if you would like to support me: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/en-bok-om-det-lilla-charmtrollet-kim#/story

It was my dream to be at Bokmässan in Göteborg with this book, but since I didn't have neither enough time nor money that dream transformed into this crowdfunding


Kim is an important part of my project Tillsammans were I work against sexual abuses in a lot of different ways. A very important thing for me is to work with young persons values and self-esteem and the character Kim was born in that process.

Please look at my TEDx-talk if you want to know more about my work and why this is so important to me. 


Things doesn't always turn out like you planned and this is a typical example of such a situation. There was neither enough time nor money to print Kim the ordinary way when the book was ready, but I made a few very expensive copies who will join me at Bokmässan the 24th-27th of September. Please visit us in stand E04:21 if you want to buy a copy for 1.000 SEK (signed and numbered) or take a look at the book before you order an ordinary book here. 

Or please click here if you want to take a look at the first eight pages straight away.

I will call the print shop as soon as the crowdfunding reaches it goal and then send you the book as soon as possible, hopefully in two weeks. That day will be the happiest in a long time for me and you will be an important part in making my dream come true!

A big thanks in advance! My company is called Black Light for a lot of reasons, one of them is that I always dress in black and always think in the most positive of ways. That is why I'm sure this will be a success! 


Or in other words: It would be extremely sad to throw Kim away after all the work the illustrator and I have put into this charming little book.

story:
We the people are printing 535 "big checks" and will be delivering them to Congress on the week of April 10th, 2016 as part of the Democracy Spring event. This is a critical week in DC, because thousands of people will be marching from Philadelphia to Washington D.C., risking arrest to put out the message to our government that the electorate are very serious about making Citizen Funded Elections the law of the land.  

These checks will be blank and fake. We will attempting to deliver blank checks to every Legislator in Congress. This is an ironic gift, the checks will not be redeemable for actual cash. They signify that their electorate recognizes the fact that the lobbying industry buys favors from them, for every big political-facing issue, from the environment to energy, from healthcare to foreign policy, and that WE ARE NOT OKAY WITH THAT! We will mock your campaign finance system by giving you a big blank check in exchange for support of campaign finance reform and citizen funded elections. 

So, we're printing 535 BIG BLANK CHECKS and will be hand-signing them with your names, and will be hand-delivering them to the US Capitol building in Washington D.C. the week of April 10th, 2016.

That's right! We have recruited enough people to hold checks and deliver them to Congress, showing them that we recognize their votes can be purchased, and that the people are NOT OKAY with that. We're asking them to support campaign finance reform and citizen funded elections, or be publically recognized as supporting the corrupt status quo.

Your donation entitles your name to be signed to one of the checks (or a number of other perks). 





We are a group of volunteers affiliated with Lawrence Lessig's superPAC MAYDAY (http://mayday.us). 

Zain Burghed - Co-organizer - The "idea guy" - I've volunteered with Mayday for about 6 months now. I started by donating to the super pac, and later I lobbied my senators to support the Fair Elections Now Act (FENA). It turns out our Washington State senators are staunchly opposed to fair elections. I came up with the idea of big fake blank checks for congress. I'm utilizing Mayday's volunteer network and the networks of sister organizations to make sure we have enough people to deliver these big fake blank checks to Congress, telling them that big money in politics is NOT OKAY! I know my picture is silly. It happened at a museum :) p.s. The fight for a proper democracy doesn't stop with politics. I'm creating a new economic democracy nonprofit startup (work in progress) where you choose how the economy moves forward with one equal vote. 




Brady Watson - Co-organizer - I've been involved with MAYDAY for about a year now.  It all started with a donation and I've taken on a larger volunteer role from there.  I believe campaign finance reform is the single most important issue facing our country today and working with MAYDAY is one way I've found to fight for reform.  I'm a videographer by trade but I've worked on a variety of projects for MAYDAY.  I think the big check idea is AWESOME because it symbolizes the corrupting power of money in politics in a funny yet compelling way.  Let's make it happen!


Daniel LaMagna - Co-Organizer - I got involved volunteering with MAYDAY after I heard Larry Lessig's TED talk on money in Washington. I believe corruption in politics is an issue that is bad for all Americans, regardless of their background, income level or political views. As the campaign's DC-local "boots on the ground," I'm helping Zain organize this campaign because it's a great way to raise awareness and send a message to Congress that their vote should not be for sale. 


Simply, our featured perk is we will sign your name to the big checks! If you give according to the perk, we will collect your full name and sign it in eloquent script on the check. We'll also send you a picture of a volunteer holding your check! 


We will attempt to deliver 535 big checks to Congress in Washington D.C. among the thousands already participating in Democracy Spring. We will try to deliver each blank check to the offices of every member of Congress. Whether the Capitol let's us do it or not is up to them ... however we will be attempting to register the delivery in advance with each Congressperson's office to make sure the event "plays by the books." If we are not allowed by the police to deliver the checks in person, we will send messages to each Congress Person to come out to the front lawn of the US Capitol building (a safe protest zone) to pick up their fake blank checks in exchange for supporting campaign finance reform and citizen funded elections. We will ask the Congress People or their respective staff members to take the "Equal Voice For All Pledge" in exchange for the big fake blank check. 
The pledge reads: 

“I pledge to fight for pro-democracy reform including citizen funding of elections, voting rights protections, anti-corruption measures, and a Constitutional Amendment to overturn Citizens United to ensure that Congress is free from the corrupting influence of big money in politics and solely dependent upon the People as equal citizens.”

We will try to record their response in audio and/or video, delivering it to our photostream, and their reading of the pledge, to solidify your Congress Person's stance on this extremely important issue. 
p.s. if you choose the Tee Shirt perk, you could look like this (results may vary): 


Disclaimer: 
This proposed event is being organized by participants in the Democracy Spring event and volunteers operating within a reform organization. We stand in solidarity with our sister organizations and all humans fighting for this specific kind of reform. We do not represent the organizations or people we collaborate with, nor do we answer to them. We are merely working towards a common cause and happily lend our efforts and creativity towards facilitating collectively sought-after reform.  



Printing the Checks - 65%
We are partnered with a DC local small business to print the big fake checks, because we love small businesses! 
Indiegogo and payment processing fees - 10%
Let's keep the crowdfunding industry going by paying their fees to use the platform! We love Indiegogo!  
Incidental Costs - 20%
Need to buy a megaphone. Tee shirt printing fees included here. Logistics surrounding demonstration permits from the local bureaucracies in Washington DC. Will be buying plenty of ink (giant markers and paint) to sign the checks and create other signs. This will also pay for Campaign Archival efforts on the internet. 
Balanced Budget Reserves - 5%
This will be a petty-cash reserve to pay for under-estimated budget items. 



Stretch Goal #1: Feed the Volunteers - $16,000

After meeting our initial $10000 goal to print the big checks, we will endeavor to feed the volunteer check holders. If we raise $16000 total, we'll be able to buy 535 sandwiches from a local DC Sandwich shop. Which sandwich shop should we go to? Let us know in the comments! (needs to have allergy and preference options, like gluten free, vegan, carnivore, etc.) about $10 per sandwich. 

Stretch Goal #2 through #52: Big Fake Checks for State Governments - $4000 additional per state! 

If we reach our $16000 goal to print the checks and deliver them to Congress whilst feeding our volunteers, we will create stretch goals to recreate this event in every state capitol. There are state legislatures with representatives and senators, and they are lobbied heavily to vote a certain way on certain things. We are working to end our backwards campaign finance system nationwide, so for every stretch goal we accomplish, we will deliver big fake blank checks to a State Legislature, showing them all that we are NOT OKAY with big money in politics, and openly mock their system by giving them big fake blank checks. 

There are 7398 elected State Legislature officials. On average, it will take about $4000 to print big blank checks per state, one for each congressperson and senator, in addition to organization costs. This is rounded up and averaged out ... some states only have about 20 legislators, and others have over 400. For every $4000 we raise after the initial $16,000, we will recreate this event in a US state, delivering blank checks to each State Legislator telling them that we're "buying" their support of campaign finance reform and citizen funded elections. For the state-level big fake check events, we won't be budgeting for sandwiches. 

That means the final stretch goal will be $216,000, best case scenario, and we'll try to host these events in every state over the next 18 months (in order of amount of volunteers we get to sign up via the signup sheet). 


State Event Cost Breakdown

70% - Printing Big Fake Blank Checks for each member of a state legislature at a local small business in the state capitol

15% - Incidental costs (ink and check mounting supplies, transportation)

10% - Indiegogo fees

5% - Under-estimate reserves

If a miracle will happen, and we raise more than is enough to perform this event in all 50 states, all the excess funding will go towards bringing more democracy and self determinism to the people of the USA and the world. We will send out a survey with options on how to spend the excess funds we raise to keep things democratic.



The big blank checks are a signal or message to Congress saying that the people recognize: 

  • Congressional services such as votes and bill cosponsorship are "for sale;" 
  • The more money a corporation or cause has, the more influence they can buy; 
  • MONEY IS NOT FREE SPEECH AND CORPORATIONS ARE NOT PEOPLE!;
  • WE ARE NOT OKAY WITH BIG MONEY IN POLITICS!; and 
  • The people would like to "buy" congressional influence by giving these big fake blank checks to Congress People. 
This campaign and the cause we're fighting for is about freedom and self-determinism. We choose to fight for an equal voice for all Americans within our chosen representative government. We believe that the amount of money someone has should not entitle them to more influence within that system than any other person. Our current system is severely out-dated. The most important first step towards fixing it is to completely restructure our campaign finance system to allow only publically funded elections. This prevents the undue influence of big money in politics, and provides for a system that is more closely merit-based - where the candidate most deserving for the office cannot be forced out of an election because they are unable to outspend their competition. 
Perhaps a subtle version of this fake-check message to Congress would be that if they don't get on board with Campaign Finance Reform and Citizen Funded Elections NOW, we'll be searching for and writing real checks to competitors for their seats in the next round of elections - which is one of Mayday's implicit goals. 


Our biggest challenge will be to source volunteers to deliver the big fake blank checks to state legislatures for our stretch goals. We already have volunteers sourced for the DC event because we are participating in Democracy Spring. A bigger overall challenge would be the fact that this severely important issue will not and cannot change overnight. We are only hoping to contribute to the whole of change, as a mere part. Our biggest goal is to raise awareness, not just with the electorate, but also to show those in power that the people are very concerned with the system as it stands. 

Sign up in your state to deliver blank checks to congress here (fun guaranteed): 

http://goo.gl/forms/OPF4SxPa7H


Raise your fist in the air and stand up for campaign finance reform and citizen funded elections. Fund this campaign and send the message with big fake checks! 

Sign up for Democracy Spring! 

Sign up in your state for the state events if we meet our stretch goals! 

 
Share this campaign with your friends. If you think sending Congress a serious ironic message in the form of a big fake blank check is a good idea, help us out by donating and telling your friends about us! 
Use the Indiegogo share tools! This is a good cause and it deserves your support!
