We reached our goal! But you can still contribute...
We’re thrilled to have reached our
$25,000 goal, and our profoundest thanks go out to the 287 donors that stepped
up before our deadline. This incredible show of generosity blew us away, and we
extend our deepest gratitude to all who contributed. 
When the good people at Indiegogo
suggested we should reignite this campaign, we immediately realized that this
could be a great thing: not only would it allow folks who’d only just heard of
us to contribute, it could be a point of entry for all those good souls wanting
to contribute in their own way to the ongoing business of running a free online
journal with global ambition and reach.
Keeping this page open also allows us
to offer you some of the same awesome perks received by campaign donors: books
autographed by Susan Bernofsky and Reif Larsen, a "Gateway to Singaporean Literature" package donated by Singaporean writers Desmond Kon and Christine Chia, and of course our exclusive
AsympTOTE bags, bookmarks, postcards, and posters. 
Run by volunteers and big-hearted
translators, Asymptote needs all the donations it can get,
so, if you like what we’ve been doing, do give what you can in order to keep reading, hearing, and seeing more from us!We Need Diverse Literature! 



We are Asymptote, a truly
international journal presenting the very best literature from all corners of
the globe. 
In a literary world characterized more
and more by a lack of diversity, as well as by an increasingly English-centered
flow of information, we bring more voices—speaking more languages—into an
ever-expanding global conversation. 

Hailing
from 27 countries, our 70 team members collaborate digitally to search
out and commission the finest writing from all corners of the world, with
accompanying artwork, audio and video—all for free. 


Issue after issue, we’ve
brought you never-before-published work by the best writers and translators of
our time. This year alone, Nobel laureates J.M. Coetzee and Herta Müller appeared
alongside 2014 Singapore Literature Prize-winner Amanda Lee Koe and 2013 EU
Prize-winner Faruk Šehić. We’ve conducted exclusive
interviews with acclaimed writers and artists such as Can Xue and Yoshitomo
Nara in their native languages, which
we then translated into English just for our readers. In our four years, we’ve
presented the best stories, essays, poetry, drama, reviews and conversations from
95 countries and 67 languages.
Some Background
Last
year, your overwhelmingly positive support gave us $20,184 to
keep us going. In return, we delivered on our promises and brought you even
more, including: 
•  A clickable map allowing the reader to navigate
our extensive archives by country;
•  A daily blog providing a window into the latest in world
literature; 
•  ‘Close
Approximations,’ our contest for emerging translators,
judged by Eliot Weinberger and Howard Goldblatt, awarding a total of $3,000 in
prize money; 
•  14 events on 4 continents (bringing our
global conversation, for the first time, to Boston, Copenhagen, Hong Kong,
Sydney, Shanghai and Zagreb).It's been a great year, full of excitement, and, despite significant overhead costs, we remain committed to providing our readers unlimited access to our ad-free pages.

Why We Need Your Help Today
Although
our mission is simple—to discover and promote the very best in international literature—achieving
it isn’t. We are unaffiliated with any institution or university, too
geographically dispersed to qualify for most funding options.The
situation is urgent. Our commitment to dialogue, diversity, and access comes at
a significant cost. For years, this burden has been shouldered out of pocket, simply
because we believe so strongly in the importance of our project, but we’re running
out of funds. 
And
so, we're reaching out to you again. We’re reaching out because we suspect you
care just as much. If you too believe in the intrinsic value of literary
translation and the free exchange of ideas between cultures around the world,
and if we’ve supplied you with even just one exciting longread or devastating
poem, please donate today.
With your support we will continue providing readers with free
online access to all of our content, and do even
more, such as:
•   Bring you more in-depth coverage of world literature,
with our Danish Fiction Feature in January, and, in April, our Vietnamese
Diaspora Feature, which will commemorate the 50th anniversary of the
Vietnam War. Via new partnerships with the best journals in Romania (Steaua) and Thailand (Writer), you’ll also enjoy
a front-row seat to these countries’ thriving literary scenes;
•  
Develop an educational arm so that teachers around the
world can incorporate Asymptote into
their lesson plans and cultivate a love for world literature in the next
generation of readers;  
•  
Support our awesome new podcast, which will go live on 8 December
and makes it possible for you to take us on the road (or to the gym);
•  
Organize more events around the globe to promote world
literature and translation. Next year, on 19 January, we will
be joined in New York by award-winning translators Edith
Grossman, Damion Searls, and 2014
Guggenheim Fellow Susan Bernofsky. On 21
January, Granta Best Young British Novelist Adam Thirlwell, and celebrated translators Daniel
Hahn, Rosalind
Harvey, and Stefan Tobler will commemorate our anniversary in London. At least eight other anniversary events are in the works.
•  
And only if we reach our target, we'll hold a second edition
of “Close Approximations,” our translation contest, with a new ‘nonfiction’
category to look for the greatest essayists from outside the Anglophone world
(the next Sebald!). This means that we will be looking to give out a total of
$4,500 in prizes to the best emerging translators worldwide.



What You Get



Be
a part of our future today by contributing what you can. You won’t just support great international
writing with your donation—you’ll also get the chance to receive a range of
exciting perks, too. To express our gratitude, we’ll give away tickets to our anniversary events, bookmarks based on the first lines of classic books, postcards featuring the gorgeous covers of our guest artists, new posters designed by Nerys Hudson based on some of our favorite first pages by Franz Kafka, Gabriel García Márquez, and Eileen Chang, as well as handy AsympTOTES created just for this campaign by our graphic designer, Berny Tan. After last year’s popular demand, we’ll also bring back the literary care packages from our editors—stuffed with goodies both edible and legible, just for you or your dearest during this holiday season.

event or contest, we’ll happily acknowledge you in all the related publicity

contribution is completely tax-deductible!

story:
Short Summary

In much of Africa only five percent of Christian churches have a pastor. Devastated by disease and war, many middle-aged Africans have died, and today over half the population is under 20 years old. Without pastors to shepherd them these young believers go astray, falling captive to destructive ideologies. Without a new generation of wise Christian leaders, their nations will remain trapped in a cycle of suffering and strife. Indigenous pastors identified the number one problem in the African church as a lack of leadership training. They joined WILD so they could train the young people of their own nations, rising up pastors and teachers across the continent. With over a million African churches and relatively few to lead, we need help to train leaders for these flocks without shepherds.

What We Need & What You Get

Funding is needed for WILD national trainers so they can provide material and discipleship to people who are essentially unable to pay for the teaching.  All donations will help provide training and supplies to churches in need.   The material and teaching curriculum are free, but they need money to make copies to share at seminars, Sunday  schools, youth meetings, and special events.  They also require financial aid for travel costs, as they minister to villages throughout their country.  There can be hours of travel to the next destination.  When seminars are held, people come from great distances to attend.  Sometimes funds are needed to help provide meals and lodging for the participants.  Our African colleagues administer the training, leading their own people into a growing, maturing faith that develops  future leaders for their countries.   All donations are tax-deductible as WILD is federally registered as a 501(c)3 tax-exempt non-profit organization. 

The Impact

By donating, you are helping impact people of all ages who never felt that they could be leaders in their culture.  These men and women of all ages are realizing God wants to use them now, and they become involved in their churches.  They are better able to articulate, defend and live out their faith in the midst of the rising challenges they face in their culture and communities.

You will be rewarded in knowing that your gift has changed the lives of many pastors, lay leaders, and most importantly, the young people of Africa.  They get excited about how God can use them in leading their friends, family, and country into the future.   They will have the skills, knowledge, hope and courage to make a positive change in their cultures.


Risks & Challenges

Villages in Africa are similar to the Northwoods of Wisconsin in that they are rural, dispersed and lack communication resources.  But Africa has also been devastated by disease (AIDS, Ebola) which has killed many of the middle-aged Africans.  Today, over half the population are teenagers or younger.  These younger people will soon be in places of leadership in their countries. They will be the influencers in their cultures. Whatever ideology captures the minds of the youth will, within a generation, control that culture.  

Key African pastors who have joined WILD’s teams have said that the number one problem in the African church is no leadership training.  The churches struggle with a poor leadership base and few pastors to serve the congregations.  There is very little strategy and implementation to involve the youth who are being aggressively pursued by other worldviews.   So many live in poverty, with no hope of a good education or a good job—a future.  If the church does not aggressively focus on training, discipling and mentoring these young people with a Biblical worldview and understandable spiritual leadership, positive cultural changes will not happen.  They will be left impoverished and hopeless.

WILD has the potential to change the future course of African nations.  The testimonials of those who are part of WILD in Africa bear that out.  The churches, pastors & especially the young people are crying out for this training.

The need is so great and the window of opportunity is getting smaller every passing day.  At this moment in time, the doors are still open to make a positive impact on the future of the people, churches and nations of Africa.  But can you hear the doors of Africa closing? 

Can you envision one young life your gift is building?  A young life trained and mentored to be a godly, spiritual leader with a heart for their own people?  A heart that will lead others to Jesus Christ?  A heart that will have a positive impact on their church, their families, their nation, their future?  Can you see them?  Then, please, decide in your heart to give whatever you can.

Other Ways You Can Help

W.I.L.D. is God's story and He is still writing it..."Shout it from the mountains...let it echo through the valleys...Jesus is alive and walking among His people...revealing His heart of love and redemption...helping them grow up into servant leaders full of grace and truth...who in turn go out and walk among their people." This is happening in Africa. WILD is truly God's story...Will you be part of the next chapter?

Please help us train leaders for the “flocks without shepherds” and if you feel led by God to respond, here are some of the ways:

* You can donate at this site.

* You can donate by mail to WILD, POB 662, Rhinelander, WI 54501

* You can donate through paypal through our website home page:  www.wildleadership.org

* You can pray.

story:
Who am I?

Hi! I'm Nick Mendillo. I've been involved in creative arts since the ripe age of 8 years old, where I would be a performer, writer, musician, artist, and director. I've been involved in many different creative projects throughout my life, but there is nothing I'm more proud of than the completion of my first novel "The Alice Atom".

Currently, I am a theatre teacher in Fall River, MA, and a house team member/teacher at the Providence Improv Guild in Providence, RI. 

What is the novel about?

Set in a world where dreams are sold as works of art through expensive machines called Dream Capture Devices, Poe Sonderman dreams nightly of a woman he has never met before, but hopes to one day marry, as she is the literal woman of his dreams.

As a way to pass the time during the day, Poe attends Dream Art auctions. On one particular day, he sees his Dream Girl being auctioned in a Dream Art, and embarks on a quest to find out not only who also dreams of this woman, but also how to find her, since she is now real. 

Who dreamt of Poe’s Dream Girl? How can he find her? Who is that rich man who purchased that Dream Art, and how does he know Poe needs this information? What will Poe say to his Dream Girl if he ever does find her? 

The Alice Atom is a philosophical search for true love on a quantum level, and like quantum physics, nothing is what it appears to be…

What's your money buying?

EDITING! It's quite difficult writing a book, and hiring a professional editor puts one's book above the rest, though they're rather pricey.

Getting an editor will result in obtaining the proper notes needed to have my book be kick-ass.
I also have decided to go the self-publishing route, as I'd rather you all read it and tell your friends about it as soon as possible, than try to get it published regionally. This is also fairly pricey.
PLEASE NOTE THAT THE TOTAL NUMBER OF HARDCOVER COPIES HAS BEEN CHANGED FROM 56 to 78!
I'm offering softcover and hardcover editions of the book. FIRST EDITIONS! WOW! If you're a collector like me, you'll want a first edition of anything!
I'm also offering very limited perks of art from wonderful local artists.

The Reality

This is going to be difficult, but I'm fully confident that my efforts will pay off, and this novel will be a book of great significance to you. Like I said, this is my crowning achievement as an artist (so far). You may hate it, but you can't hate one's desire to push beyond their comfort zone.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this with all of your friends! The more folks know about this, the easier it will be to reach my goal. Then you can say that you were in on the ground floor of a really fantastic writing endeavor.

A mémek korántsem voltak annyira egyértelműek és viccesek a személyes honlapok korában. Dawkins elmélete még csak a huszas éveiben járt és tűnhetett akár egy durva antiutópiának (az elme vírusa), vagy akár kétes jelentőségű hóbortok tudományának (fordított baseball sapka járvány). Az internetes mémekre csak később ragadt a "mém" megnevezés, évekig csak "jelenségek" voltak.

Mik ezek?


Ismerős-e Polgár Jenő, Szalacsi Sándor, vagy Uhrin Benedek? Esetleg a Bikicsunáj? Mind ismerős, sőt az összes Szomszédok oldalág a kép makrókkal és a kisípolt videókkal együtt? Ezek a mémek, a kultúra önállóan szaporodó egységei a legegyszerűbb vicctől a komplex egységeket lebontó és újrahasznosító jelenségekig, vagy akár egyes személyiségekig. A mémek a kultúra génjei. A kultúra pedig az ember természetes környezete, túlélésének módja és evolúciójának oka.

Minek ez, ha megvan a neten?


Elsősorban azért, mert sok ponton meghaladja a neten elérhető, akár magyar, akár angol nyelvű forrásokat, mivel nem csak adott mémekről, hanem elméletről is szól, de külön szócikket kap benne például a mémeket pénzre váltó mémipar. Másodsorban azért mert nyomtatott dolgok olvasásakor, nincsenek jelen a számítógépre jellemző zavaró tényezők. Harmadsorban az enyészet a mémeket sem kíméli, pár évtized múlva már a netezők sem fognak emlékezni rájuk.


Közelebből

Borítóterv

Beloldal terv



Tartalom

  • Bevezetés - magyarázat olyan alapvető dolgokról, mint például mi számít internetes mémnek vagy jelenségnek, és mi nem
  • Rövid dolgozat - a mémelmélet egy lehetséges variációja, amely a génekhez hasonlóan kifejeződés (funkció) alapján értékeli a mémeket, míg a kultúrát az evolúció során megjelenő önálló élő entitásként értelmezi
  • A-Z (0-9) - jelenleg 1252 címszó van, ami - átirányításokat nem számítva - nagyjából 1000 szócikket eredményez
  • Függelékek - internetes mémek év, hely, média, vagy állat szerint
  • A tisztelt támogatók listája - kérjük képzelje el, amint neve megjelenik ezen a listán

A borítótervről


Az Internetes Mémek és Jelenségek Enciklopédiája nem népszerűsít vagy támad sem adott egyházat, sem különböző vallásos nézeteket. Jézus Krisztus képének felhasználását illetően: a vallásgyalázás nem áll szándékunkban, ilyesmi reményeink szerint szándékunkon kívül sem állapítható meg.

Amire szükségünk van


Egy enciklopédia létrehozása igen sok munkával jár, ezért a gyűjtött összeg legjelentősebb része arra szükségeltetik, hogy teljes időmet erre a munkára fordíthassam. A büdzsé struktúráját lásd lentebb. Az arányok viszonylag méretfüggetlenek - nagyobb megrendelés olcsóbb nyomtatást eredményez, viszont növeli a logisztikai kiadásokat.

  • 22% - díjak és adók
  • 15% - nyomdaköltség és szállítás
  • 25% - kikézbesítés
  • 38% - írás, szerkesztés


Ami jár

A hozzájáruláshoz rendelhető dolgokat a jobb oldalon elhelyezkedő dobozokban találod.
Minden jutalom tartalmazza a kiszállítás költségét.
A jutalmaknál megjelenő elemek részletes adatai a következők:

story:
Raffle Details!

But here's the really cool thing!!!! For every $25 you donate, you get one entry our our raffle to win this awesome eco-friendly glad rag bag!


BellaMia Magazine  started in 2015. This magazine has been a whirlwind of empowering, holistic and transformational information for women in all areas of their life, especially Body Image.   BellaMia mag needs your support through backing to allow us to move to the next level creating a high end magazine for women written by women. At BellaMia, we believe that every woman is beautiful. It is our mission to inspire you to see your own unique beauty when you look in the mirror.



BellaMia is our inaugural fashion, beauty and lifestyle magazine providing real life women with advice, tips, and tricks they can use. From fashion to recipes, from body image to relationship issues, our experts keep you in the know so that you can create the life of your dreams.

We envision BellaMia to be a perpetual celebration and reflection of the diverse forms of beauty in all women.



The Back Story

Editor-in-chief Mia Saenz tells you in her own words what prompted her to start BellaMia Magazine.

As a Transformational Love Coach specializing in Self-Love and Body connecting, I’ve worked with thousands of woman who find it difficult to like their own beautiful body.  Let alone to balance and connect the two together within themselves is nearly impossible without help.  The Statistics show that 90% of women do not like their body. That is far too many.

The development of BellaMia magazine was rather magical.  A friend who publishes magazine pointed out I could reach more people by starting a magazine.  This is the beginning of this very rapid journey.  The moment I decided to do this, information poured in quickly on how to do everything, step by step.  It was rather a spiritual experience.  Everyone including the 45 writers and the 5 Editor Directors came forward very fast.  There were more than 100 professionals in their fields wanting to participate with BellaMia but I had to pick and choose who was best for BellaMia. 

BellaMia has a life of it's own and within these pages people fall in love with her.


Why BellaMia?

Peruse any grocery store or bookstore and you’ll find women’s magazines galore. You’ll learn how to lose weight, put on muscle, or instructions for exactly how you should look to be beautiful. At BellaMia, we believe that all women are beautiful – just as they are. We embrace your courage and sense of style, love your curves and your freckles, and think your purple-streaked hair is awesome. We don’t want you to “tame” your frizzy red tresses or lose 50 pounds, we want you to learn to love the skin you’re in.

We realize that there are other movements out there that want women to see their own beauty. And we plan to start our own #BeautifulMe campaign with the August issue. But there is no magazine with that purpose in mind. There is no place to go for information on how to just be you, no place you can go and ask experts for self-love, body image, or relationships advice. We know your struggles. We see you. We are you.


Every Issue of BellaMia Will Feature:

·  Body (Fitness)

·  Me (Body Image, Self-Love, Women’s Wellness, & Sexual Wellness)

·  Alluring (Fashion & Beauty)

·  Dish (Recipes)

·  International Women: Beauty Across Cultures

·  Creating Sacred Space

·  Meet Our BellaMan!

·  New Paradigm (Personal Development)

·  Parenting Issues

·  Business Advice

·  Our BellaScope

·  Ask Our Experts (Relationship Rescue, Body Image SOS, Ask a Therapist)


The Bottom Line

Here is exactly what needs funding so you can contribute with confidence and know where your money is being invested. 

We started BellaMia on a wing and a prayer in January 2015 and we are about to release our third issue. As the magazine has grown in size and popularity, so too have our costs. Although our ultimate goal is a $100,000, we aren’t going to attempt a marathon before we’ve even run a mile. This initial $25,000 pledge will give us the boost we need to gain momentum and get our magazine off the ground. We are excited to announce that just last week, our viewership was 25,000 for the week. That is HUGE for a start-up magazine, and only begins to demonstrate the quality of our magazine and the importance of our message.

We know, we know, talking money is boring, so we created a graph and a table for you!


Editorials

Creating high end images, including the work of a photographer, make-up artist, model, and a stylist; hiring a studio, equipment and props

$4500

Art Department

Responsible for all magazine layout, purchasing article images, uploading to website, preparing magazine layout for both on-line and print edition specifications

$5000

Marketing

Designing and printing marketing and branding material, sponsoring advertising partnerships, and putting together high end events to help create community and spread the word

$7500

Legal/Accounting

$2500

Editing Staff

Editors proofread and fact-check all pieces before publication to ensure we deliver the most up-to-date, accurate information to our readers.

$3000

Indiegogo & Perk Fulfillment

$2500


If you’re unable to provide financial support, you can still be part of this exciting opportunity as your social media support is worth just as much!

Sharing our page on as many social platforms and with your friends, family, colleagues and acquaintances could make all the difference to our magazine’s success. Just make sure to mention, tag, follow and like us!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BellaMiaMag

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BellaMiaMag

Instagram: https://instagram.com/bellamiamag/

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/BellaMiaMag/

Thanks in advance. We hope you’re as excited as we are!

The Bella Babes

story:
(zie de Nederlandse tekst onderaan)

Contexte

Nous pouvons nous féliciter des lois relatives à la liberté d’expression, liberté de la presse, motivations des décisions administratives et judiciaires, accès aux dossiers administratifs, etc. La loi ne peut pas tout régler. Dans certains domaines, le niveau de transparence dépend de la libre volonté des acteurs politiques. Tel est le cas des partis politiques.

Nous espérons que la publication d’une évaluation comparative incitera les partis à améliorer leur niveau de transparence. La mise en évidence de certaines lacunes (p.ex. opacité des données financières) pourra alimenter le débat public.

S’il y a fracture entre le monde politique est les citoyens, la transparence une condition indispensable pour rétablir la confiance. Les partis sont principalement financés par l'Etat et par les membres. Les gens trouvent qu'ils ont droit à une grande transparence.

Sans transparence il n’y a pas de véritable démocratie. Plus le pouvoir est concentré dans les mains des partis, plus le public est intéressé à ce que les partis soient eux-mêmes démocratiques, et qu’ils montrent un exemple de transparence.

Nous évaluerons les partis belges avec au moins un député dans un parlement.

L’institut espagnol  « Fundación Compromiso y Transparencia » réalise depuis quatre ans une évaluation semblable des partis politiques espagnols et de leurs fondations. Nous disposons donc de multiples rapports sur le sujet.

Objectivité

La neutralité de l’auteur est une condition pour la crédibilité de l’enquête. L’enquête sera réalisée en partenariat : une journaliste francophone, Isabelle Anneet, un journaliste néerlandophone, Miguel Desnerck, et NousCitoyens.

NousCitoyens prend toute une série de mesures pour garantir une neutralité vis-à-vis des partis politiques. Une de ses mesures est la désignation d’une personne-relais dans chaque parti, dont le nom est publié.

En mai 2014, lors des élections, NousCitoyens a mis en ligne une première version de son application www.RepertoirePolitique.be où près de 5000 acteurs politiques belges sont répertoriés. Parmi ceux-ci, 1500 candidats aux élections de mai 2014 ont collaboré en remplissant un questionnaire politique (pour le GPS électoral). Nos projets sont validés par un comité scientifique composé de professeurs d’université et de journalistes.

Originalité

Selon les premières recherches, il n’existe pas de précédent en Belgique, certainement pas sous forme d’un ‘rating’ des partis politiques.

L’idée d’évaluer la transparence des partis politiques en intégrant la transparence de leurs mandataires est totalement inédite, même hors de la Belgique.

Méthodologie de l’évaluation

Dans un premier temps on cherche à quantifier de façon irréfutable la transparence, selon une méthode révisée par le comité scientifique de NousCitoyens, présidé par le André-Paul Frognier, professeur émérite de l’UCL en sciences politiques.

On examine trois sources, qui sont des références en matière de transparence: le site Web du parti, Cumuleo et le Répertoire Politique de NousCitoyens.

Le site web du parti

En terme de communication, la page Facebook du parti peut être un instrument important, voire plus important, que le site web officiel du parti. Toutefois, en matière de transparence, nous considérons que le site web est la référence, et nous limitons notre analyse à cette source.

Partant d’une « check-list », on examine le contenu des sites web. Nous comptons, en principe, soumettre aux partis la grille d’évaluation afin qu’ils puissent réagir s’il y avait eu distraction de notre part. Ceci ne concerne pas l’évaluation finale.

Cumuleo

Cumuleo reproduit les listes de mandats que les mandataires politiques ont l’obligation de déposer auprès de le Cour des Comptes. Cumuleo a les moyens de constater qui sont les mandataires défaillants par rapport à deux obligations : dépôt de la liste des mandats, déclaration de patrimoine. Cumuleo peut donc calculer le % de mandataires de chaque parti ayant respecté leurs obligations. 

Le Répertoire Politique

NousCitoyens publie un répertoire des acteurs politiques. Le répertoire lui-même indique le niveau d’exhaustivité du profil de chaque acteur politique. Il est donc possible de calculer la moyenne statistique des mandataires de chaque parti. A terme, il sera possible de différencier le niveau de transparence dans le profil proprement dit, et dans les opinions (càd les réponses aux questions politiques).

Les mandataires politiques disposent d’un mot de passe pour éditer directement leur profil. Ils contrôlent directement le niveau d’exhaustivité. L’idée consiste donc à évaluer la transparence du parti au travers de la transparence de ses mandataires. On se limitera aux parlementaires et bourgmestres.

NousCitoyens calculera les statistiques par partis. 

A quoi servira la collecte ?

Le budget couvre aussi bien l’enquête en Flandres qu’en Belgique francophone.

coûts

  • Prestations (3 mois)       12.000  
  • Petits frais (3 mois)             3.000  
  • Achat des statistiques                         1.900  
  • Total                                                        16.900  

Financement

  • Fonds Pascal Decroos                       4.500  
  • Crowdfunding et autres                   11.900  
  • Média                                                          500  
  • Total                                                      16.900  

Les prestations concernent :

  • l’analyse de l'expérience étrangère
  • la rédaction et la validation de la méthodologie
  • l'analyse des sites des partis
  • la coordination 
  • le calcul des scores
  • les contacts et la correspondance avec les partis
  • la rédaction et la validation d'un rapport d’analyse complet
  • les interviews des partis et des citoyens
  • la rédaction des articles proprement dits (pour publication par la presse)
  • le traitement administratif
  • la recherche d’une solution pour répéter l’opération si possible chaque année

-------------------------------------

(Nederlandse versie)

Context

We kunnen onszelf gelukkig prijzen met de bestaande wetten inzake de vrijheid van meningsuiting, persvrijheid, motivaties van administratieve en gerechtelijke besluiten, toegang tot administratieve dossiers enzoverder. De wet kan niet alles regelen. In bepaalde domeinen is de mate van transparantie afhankelijk van de vrije wil van de politici. Dat is het geval bij politieke partijen.

We hopen dat de publicatie van een vergelijkende beoordeling de partijen zal aanmoedigen om hun transparantie te verbeteren. De onthulling van bepaalde tekortkomingen (waaronder de ondoorzichtigheid van financiële gegevens) zal in het openbaar debat uitgebreid aan bod komen.

Bij een breuk tussen de politiek en de burgers, is transparantie een voorwaarde om het vertrouwen te herstellen. De partijen worden hoofdzakelijk door de Staat en de leden gefinancierd. De mensen vinden dan ook dat ze recht hebben op transparantie.

Zonder transparantie is er geen echte democratie. Hoe meer de macht in de handen van de partijen ligt, hoe belangrijker het voor de bevolking is dat de partijen democratisch zijn en zich transparant opstellen.

We zullen de Belgische partijen met minstens één vertegenwoordiger in een parlement beoordelen.

Het Spaanse instituut ‘Fundación Compromiso y Transparencia’ stelt sinds vier jaar een soortgelijke beoordeling van de Spaanse politieke partijen en hun stichtingen op. We bezitten dus meerdere rapporten over het onderwerp.

Objectiviteit

De neutraliteit van de auteur is een voorwaarde voor de geloofwaardigheid van het onderzoek. Dat onderzoek zal in samenwerking tussen de volgende personen worden uitgevoerd: de Franstalige journaliste Isabelle Anneet, de Nederlandstalige journalist Miguel Desnerck en WijBurgers.

WijBurgers neemt een reeks maatregelen waarmee ze de neutraliteit tegenover de politieke partijen wil waarborgen. Eén van die maatregelen is de aanduiding van een tussenpersoon in iedere partij waarvan de naam wordt gepubliceerd.

Voor de verkiezingen van mei 2014 heeft WijBurgers een eerste versie van haar toepassing de Politieke Databank online gezet. Die Politieke Databank bevat ongeveer 5000 politici waarvan er 1500, die zich in mei 2014 hadden kandidaat gesteld, een politieke vragenlijst hebben ingevuld (voor de Kieswijzer). Een wetenschappelijk comité van hoogleraars en journalisten bekrachtigt onze projecten.

Nieuwheid

Op het eerste zicht blijkt dat er in België geen eerder onderzoek naar de beoordeling van politieke partijen werd gedaan.

De idee om de transparantie van de mandaathebbers te integreren bij de beoordeling van de transparantie van de politieke partijen, is zelfs buiten België totaal nieuw.

Methodologie van de beoordeling

De transparantie gaan we quantificeren op basis van een methode die het wetenschappelijk comité van WijBurgers onder leiding van André-Paul Frognier heeft herzien. Laatstgenoemde is emeritus hoogleraar aan de UCL in politieke wetenschappen.

We onderzoeken drie bronnen die naar de mate van transparantie verwijzen: de website van de partij, Cumuleo en de Politieke Databank van WijBurgers.

De website van de partij

Op het gebied van communicatie kan de Facebookpagina van de partij een belangrijk instrument zijn, zelfs belangrijker dan haar officiële website. Desondanks zijn wij van mening dat de website de referentie is en we beperken onze analyse daarom tot die bron.

Vertrekkende van een checklist onderzoeken we de inhoud van de websites. In principe zijn we van plan om alle partijen het evaluatierooster voor te leggen zodat zij kunnen reageren in het geval er een verstrooiing van onze kant is. Dat geldt niet voor de eindbeoordeling. 

Cumuleo

Cumuleo reproduceert mandatenlijsten die de mandatarissen bij de Rekenkamer moeten indienen. Cumuleo heeft de middelen om mandatarissen die ten opzichte van twee verplichtingen in gebreke zijn gebleven, te identificeren. Het gaat dan om de indiening van de mandatenlijst en de vermogensaangifte. Cumuleo kan dus het percentage mandatarissen van iedere partij berekenen die hun verplichtingen zijn nagekomen.

WijBurgers

WijBurgers publiceert een databank van politici. De databank geeft het volledigheidsniveau van het profiel van iedere politicus weer. Het is daarom mogelijk om het statistisch gemiddelde van de mandatarissen van iedere partij te berekenen.

De mandatarissen hebben een wachtwoord waarmee ze rechtstreeks hun profiel kunnen bewerken. Zij controleren dus direct hun volledigheidsniveau. De idee is dus dat we de transparantie van de partij op basis van de transparantie van haar leden zullen beoordelen. We zullen ons echter tot de parlementsleden en burgemeesters beperken.

WijBurgers zal de statistieken per partij berekenen.


“Waar dient de inzameling voor?”

Het budget omvat zowel het onderzoek in Vlaanderen als in Franstalig België.

  •   Prestaties (3 maanden)            12.000 
  •   Kleine kosten (3 maanden)       3.000 
  •   Aankoop statistieken                   1.900 
  •   Totaal                                              16.900 

 Financiering

  •   Fonds Pascal Decroos          4.500 
  •   Crowdfunding en andere    11.900 
  •   Media                                              500 
  •   Totaal                                        16.900 

De prestaties omvatten:

  • de analyse van de ervaring in het buitenland
  • de redactie en validatie van de methodologie
  • de analyse van de websites van de partijen
  • de coördinatie
  • de berekening van de scores
  • de contacten en correspondentie met de partijen
  • de redactie en validatie van een uitvoerig auditverslag
  • de interviews van de partijen en burgers
  • de redactie van de eigenlijke artikels (voor publicatie door de pers)
  • de administratieve afhandeling
  • de zoektocht naar een oplossing om de procedure indien mogelijk jaarlijks te herhalen

(zie de Nederlandse tekst onderaan)Contexte
Nous pouvons nous féliciter des
lois relatives à la liberté d’expression, liberté de la presse, motivations des
décisions administratives et judiciaires, accès aux dossiers administratifs,
etc. La loi ne peut pas tout régler. Dans certains domaines, le niveau de
transparence dépend de la libre volonté des acteurs politiques. Tel est le cas
des partis politiques. 
Nous espérons que la publication
d’une évaluation comparative incitera les partis à améliorer leur niveau de
transparence. La mise en évidence de certaines lacunes (p.ex. opacité des
données financières) pourra alimenter le débat public.
S’il y a fracture entre le monde
politique est les citoyens, la transparence une condition indispensable pour
rétablir la confiance. Les partis sont principalement financés par l'Etat et
par les membres. Les gens trouvent qu'ils ont droit à une grande transparence.
Sans transparence il n’y a pas
de véritable démocratie. Plus le pouvoir est concentré dans les mains des
partis, plus le public est intéressé à ce que les partis soient eux-mêmes
démocratiques, et qu’ils montrent un exemple de transparence.
Nous évaluerons les partis
belges avec au moins un député dans un parlement.
L’institut espagnol  « Fundación Compromiso y
Transparencia » réalise depuis quatre ans une évaluation semblable des
partis politiques espagnols et de leurs fondations. Nous disposons donc de
multiples rapports sur le sujet.
Objectivité
La neutralité de l’auteur est
une condition pour la crédibilité de l’enquête. L’enquête sera réalisée en
partenariat : une journaliste francophone, Isabelle Anneet, un journaliste
néerlandophone, Miguel Desnerck, et NousCitoyens. 
NousCitoyens prend toute une
série de mesures pour garantir une neutralité vis-à-vis des partis politiques.
Une de ses mesures est la désignation d’une personne-relais dans chaque parti,
dont le nom est publié. 
En mai 2014, lors des élections,
NousCitoyens a mis en ligne une première version de son application www.RepertoirePolitique.be où près de 5000 acteurs
politiques belges sont répertoriés. Parmi ceux-ci, 1500 candidats aux élections
de mai 2014 ont collaboré en remplissant un questionnaire politique (pour le GPS électoral). Nos projets sont
validés par un comité
scientifique composé de professeurs d’université et de journalistes. 
Originalité
Selon les premières recherches,
il n’existe pas de précédent en Belgique, certainement pas sous forme d’un
‘rating’ des partis politiques. 
L’idée d’évaluer la transparence
des partis politiques en intégrant la transparence de leurs mandataires est
totalement inédite, même hors de la Belgique. 
Méthodologie de l’évaluation
Dans un premier temps on cherche
à quantifier de façon irréfutable la transparence, selon une méthode révisée
par le comité scientifique de NousCitoyens, présidé par le André-Paul Frognier,
professeur émérite de l’UCL en sciences politiques.
On examine trois sources, qui
sont des références en matière de transparence: le site Web du parti, Cumuleo
et le Répertoire Politique de NousCitoyens.
Le site web du parti
En terme de communication, la
page Facebook du parti peut être un instrument important, voire plus important,
que le site web officiel du parti. Toutefois, en matière de transparence, nous
considérons que le site web est la référence, et nous limitons notre analyse à
cette source.
Partant d’une
« check-list », on examine le contenu des sites web. Nous comptons, en principe, soumettre aux partis la grille
d’évaluation afin qu’ils puissent réagir s’il y avait eu distraction de notre part. Ceci ne concerne pas l’évaluation finale.
Cumuleo
Cumuleo reproduit les listes de
mandats que les mandataires politiques ont l’obligation de déposer auprès de le
Cour des Comptes. Cumuleo a les moyens de constater qui sont les mandataires
défaillants par rapport à deux obligations : dépôt de la liste des mandats,
déclaration de patrimoine. Cumuleo peut donc calculer le % de mandataires de
chaque parti ayant respecté leurs obligations. 
Le Répertoire Politique
NousCitoyens publie un
répertoire des acteurs politiques. Le répertoire lui-même indique le niveau
d’exhaustivité du profil de chaque acteur politique. Il est donc possible de
calculer la moyenne statistique des mandataires de chaque parti. A terme, il
sera possible de différencier le niveau de transparence dans le profil
proprement dit, et dans les opinions (càd les réponses aux questions
politiques).
Les mandataires politiques
disposent d’un mot de passe pour éditer directement leur profil. Ils contrôlent
directement le niveau d’exhaustivité. L’idée consiste donc à évaluer la transparence
du parti au travers de la transparence de ses mandataires. On se limitera aux
parlementaires et bourgmestres. 
NousCitoyens calculera les
statistiques par partis. A quoi servira la collecte ?
Le budget couvre
aussi bien l’enquête en Flandres qu’en Belgique francophone.coûts

story:
Having spent the past sixteen years developing the fantasy world of Yma, I am finally ready to unveil Wrath of the Fallen, the first book of The Wanderers, a fantasy epic that will span thousands of years of history and dozens of nations to reveal this rich world to readers.
My name is Tom Austin, and the book I've written is full of intrigue, romance, adventure, horror, and even a touch of humor. A story of both elves and humans, it is a story nonetheless about people and the fears and prejudices that both tear families apart and bring down nations.

This is a very important project for me, since I have put so much effort into writing this novel and hope to continue with sequels, and possibly even an eventual roleplaying game based on the world.

Currently, though, I need to raise the money for editing, marketing, ISBN registration, and web presence. I already have an editor lined up who will work with me for approximately $1,000, but I need to raise the money first. As you can see, I have a book cover, so that is taken care of as well, but there is still so much to do in order to do it right.

Here's a current breakdown of where the money will be going:
  • Editing:  $1,000
  • ISBN registration: $300 (I will be buying 10 ISBN numbers for future books.)
  • Marketing Budget:  $500 (Includes advertising and website fees.)
  • Unknown Expenditures: $700

As for Unknown Expenditures, since I am living on disability, anything that I don't use for actual publishing will be put toward other essentials, like paying bills or buying groceries. It also refers to any money put toward future projects that I haven't thought of yet.

Telling the Story

People say that every story has been told, but this story has not been told, because I haven't told it yet. Well, now I am, and I really want to share with you a world of gods and demons, immortals and madmen. Insane priests and dangerous revenants inhabit the world of Yma. This is a story that begins a journey that I hope that will allow us to enjoy the ride together.

Self-publishing takes a lot of time and a lot of dedication, and I am in a special situation that allows me to dedicate that time to it, and I certainly have the dedication. This story, although it's fantasy, is as important to me as if it were my memoir. It's not just the culmination of years of work, it's the beginning of years of adventure.
If you can't contribute, please share this and let others know. Thanks for everything!

story:
PanamericanWorld es un medio de comunicación digital bilingüe (inglés y español), fundado en Toronto con el objetivo de crear puentes entre Canadá, América Latina y el Caribe. Ponemos el foco de nuestras historias en el ámbito del emprendimiento y las startups, el deporte, la cultura y viajes. Queremos desarrollar esta campaña de crowdfunding para crecer como medio de comunicación y ofrecer nuevas e interesantes historias no contadas de América Latina, mostradas de manera original y atractiva, como no suelen hacer los medios tradicionales. Contamos para ello con un amplio equipo de reputados periodistas ubicados en las principales capitales de América Latina.



Crear un nuevo periodismo para América Latina

Nos gustan las historias con final feliz. Creemos en un periodismo serio y riguroso basado en historias y relatos con un marcado componente humano.  Un periodismo reposado atento a los detalles, a la trastienda de la noticia.

Toronto es uno de los principales centros para la innovación tecnológica y social del mundo y cada día surgen nuevas historias y exitosos proyectos empresariales que queremos que conozcas. Las experiencias de estos emprendedores o el dinámico ecosistema de Startups en América Latina generan importantes oportunidades entre Canadá y las Américas, y PanamericanWorld es el puente que las conecta.

Porque hay tanto que decir sobre los negocios y emprendimiento, el deporte y la vibrante vida cultural de América Latina; queremos hacer más y enriquecer nuestras historias originales con un apoyo audiovisual más eficaz. Nuestro objetivo es ofrecer cada día mejores historias y más elaboradas, que nuestros periodistas ubicados en las Américas puedan dedicar el tiempo necesario a trabajar en sus reportajes. Porque las buenas historias requieren tiempo para ser bien contadas.

Nuestros contribuidores obtendrán privilegios, acceso preferente a nuestros artículos originales, posibilidad de publicar su historia de emprendimiento en nuestra web y garantía de visibilidad.

Contar historias universales

La razón por la que estamos pidiendo su ayuda es porque queremos involucrar a más escritores, presentar nuevas historias nunca contadas de América Latina y ofrecer más posibilidades de elección de los contenidos. En definitiva, queremos crecer como medio de comunicación para ser más influyentes, ofrecer mejores contenidos y responder de forma más eficaz a las demandas de nuestros lectores.

Crecer para hacer un periodismo más humano

Usted verá el impacto de su contribución al instante, a medida que desarrollamos nuevos contenidos originales que seguro querrá disfrutar y compartir. Su contribución irá directamente a la creación de nuevos y mejores contenidos con mayor respaldo multimedia.

Conoce nuestro talentoso equipo de escritores y periodistas; ellos están entusiasmados con la idea de escribir nuevas historias no contadas y compartirlas con el mundo. Su apoyo va a enriquecer sus vidas y la suya propia.
story_txt:
PanamericanWorld es un medio de comunicación digital bilingüe (inglés y español), fundado en Toronto con el objetivo de crear puentes entre Canadá, América Latina y el Caribe. Ponemos el foco de nuestras historias en el ámbito del emprendimiento y las startups, el deporte, la cultura y viajes. Queremos desarrollar esta campaña de crowdfunding para crecer como medio de comunicación y ofrecer nuevas e interesantes historias no contadas de América Latina, mostradas de manera original y atractiva, como no suelen hacer los medios tradicionales. Contamos para ello con un amplio
equipo de reputados periodistas ubicados en las principales capitales de América
Latina.




Crear un nuevo periodismo para América Latina

Nos gustan las historias con final feliz. Creemos en un periodismo serio y riguroso basado en historias y relatos con un marcado componente humano.  Un periodismo reposado atento a los detalles, a la trastienda de la noticia.



Toronto es uno de los principales centros para la innovación tecnológica y social del mundo y cada día surgen nuevas historias y exitosos proyectos empresariales que queremos que conozcas. Las experiencias de estos emprendedores o el dinámico ecosistema de Startups en América Latina generan importantes oportunidades entre Canadá y las Américas, y PanamericanWorld es el puente que las conecta.
 Porque
hay tanto que decir sobre los negocios y emprendimiento, el deporte y la vibrante vida cultural de América Latina; queremos hacer más y enriquecer nuestras historias
originales con un apoyo audiovisual más eficaz. Nuestro objetivo es ofrecer cada día mejores historias y más elaboradas, que nuestros periodistas ubicados en las Américas puedan dedicar el tiempo necesario a trabajar en sus reportajes. Porque las buenas historias requieren tiempo para ser bien contadas.  
Nuestros contribuidores obtendrán privilegios, acceso preferente a nuestros artículos originales, posibilidad de publicar su historia de emprendimiento en nuestra web y garantía de visibilidad.

Contar historias universales

 La
razón por la que estamos pidiendo su ayuda es porque queremos involucrar a más
escritores, presentar nuevas historias nunca contadas de América Latina y ofrecer
más posibilidades de elección de los contenidos. En definitiva, queremos crecer como medio de comunicación para ser más influyentes, ofrecer mejores contenidos y responder de forma más eficaz a las demandas de nuestros lectores.
Crecer para hacer un periodismo más humano

  
Usted verá el impacto de su
contribución al instante, a medida que desarrollamos nuevos contenidos
originales que seguro querrá disfrutar y compartir. Su contribución irá directamente a la creación de nuevos y mejores contenidos con mayor respaldo multimedia.
Conoce nuestro talentoso equipo de escritores y periodistas; ellos están entusiasmados con la idea de
escribir nuevas historias no contadas y compartirlas con el mundo. Su apoyo va
a enriquecer sus vidas y la suya propia.

story:
Thank You for visiting my Indiegogo campaign page. My name is Chris Coad Taylor.

    What is the Ordinary Heroes-Voices of History book project? The concept is simple. It has been over seventy years since the end of World War II and we are losing the opportunity to speak first-hand with the veterans and their families. My publishing company is documenting the personal accounts direct from the people who lived during this time. Although, we don’t want to make another history book with dates and battles to memorize, what we aim to achieve is a book of personal and engaging stories of the people.

   Why is it important to the community? Our purpose is to have a book that will connect the younger generation with the past so that yours and my children, and the grandchildren can understand the world of the past. History books do not transport the readers into the lives of the people and the world of the past. Personal accounts of the atmosphere and feelings of the time gives the readers knowledge of a world different from theirs. This connection will allow our children and their children to “never forget” what our veterans and families sacrificed go many years ago for them.

   How can you help? Any and all of your support is appreciated and needed. The the success of this massive project relies on many elements. Pledges start as low as $15.00.The more money we collect the further our reach will go in presenting and sharing the book.

   If a money pledge is not possible than you can still help. We need everyone to get the word out about this project. Share our campaign on Facebook or tell your friends in person about our project. Support honors our veterans and shares a part of our country’s history that is rare to find.

   My inspiration to compile stories of the wartime days came from my father, who was a WWII veteran. Mother was an inspiration, too. Like many at home during WWII she worked to support the war effort. Both my parents passed away at a young age, never seeing my children grow up. This left a hole in the family, a broken link to the past. The opportunity to ask my father about those times is lost, but through the sharing of stories from others, the opportunity to link to the past will be saved.

Through the Ordinary Heroes-Voice of History book project, we will be able to offer a connection for all of the younger generations now and other generations to come. I hope you will want to be part of this important project

   What if we don’t make our goal? The book is underway and moving forward and it will be published. We have the stories. We have the authors and we have the skills and the experience to produce the book. However, my company is in its infancy. We are small and need financial backers to help make this project shine.

   Our vision is broader than just the completion of a printed book. We want to do much more. We need money not for a quick proofread. To be able to hire the top professionals for editing, proofreading, host well-publicized events to market the book before and after it is printed and keep our the goal to share some of the profits with veteran organizations we need your help. We hope to connect with schools so we can put the book into the student’s hands as a history study program. All this extra expense can only be absorbed by getting close to or over our campaign goal. We can accomplish all these things with supporters like you

story:
Lire en français


Support FEMEN Canada

We need your support to pursue our activism for secularism, feminism, democracy, freedom of speech and fundamental human rights.

FEMEN is an international movement of feminist activists: our breasts are our bombs and our nudity is a subversive mode of representation. We protest against religious institutions, the sex industry and all forms of political dictatorship and fascism. With the power of our freedom, we want to destroy patriarchy and all its forms of human alienation.

We stage unique non-violent protests to directly face the biggest enemies of freedom, whether they are politicians or religious lobbyists who want to make politics against human rights and democracy, or all those who contribute to human traffic for prostitution, for example.

We need you! We use creative methods to protest and they have a cost: only your help can make us stay independent and free.

 Each dollar you donate will be used to buy material (banners, costumes, paint, flowers, etc.), pay for transport and anything else we could need for our artistic political actions.

Donate to help us take the voice of justice and equality in the high political spheres that repress them way too often!

Other ways to help

You want to join the movement or help us in different ways?

  •  Write us at femencanada@gmail.com
  • Follow us on facebook and twitter and share our activities
  •  Don't forget to share this campaign with your friends!

Help us stay true advocates for human rights  and freedom!


Français


Supportez FEMEN Canada

Nous avons besoin de votre support pour continuer à défendre laïcité, féminisme, démocratie, liberté d’expression et droits humains fondamentaux.

FEMEN est un mouvement international d’activistes féministes: nos seins sont nos armes et notre nudité est un mode subversif de représentation. Nous manifestons contre les institutions religieuses, l’industrie du sexe et toutes les formes de dictature politique et de fascisme. Par la force de notre liberté, nous voulons détruire le patriarcat et ses modes d’aliénation humaine.

Nous performons des actions politiques uniques et entièrement non violentes. Nous faisons face directement aux plus grands ennemis de la liberté, qu’ils soient politiciens ou lobbyistes religieux qui tentent d’établir des politiques contre les droits humains et la démocratie, ou tous ceux qui contribuent aux trafic humain pour la prostitution, par exemple.

Nous avons besoin de vous! Nos méthodes créatives ont un coût et seuls vos dons peuvent nous permettre de rester indépendantes et libres.

Chaque dollar que vous versez servira à financer une action: à acheter du matériel (bannières, peintures, fleurs, déguisements, etc.), à payer pour le transport et tout ce dont nous pourrions avoir besoin pour nos actions artistiques. Faites un don et aidez-nous à propulser la voix de l’égalité et de la justice dans les hautes sphères politiques qui la répriment bien trop souvent!

Autres façons d'aider

Vous voulez joindre le mouvement ou nous aider d'autres façons?

  •  Écrivez-nous à femencanada@gmail.com
  • Suivez-nous sur facebook et twitter et partagez nos actions!
  •  N'oubliez pas de partager cette campagne avec vos amis!

story:
Swirl Girl: Confessions of a Racial Outlaw is a memoir by TaRessa Stovall.

___________________________________________________


TaRessa is a published author, college professor and public relations specialist who aims to elevate the national conversation about racial identity. She'll do so by sharing her remarkable-coming-of-age as a Mixed child growing up in Seattle, Washington against the backdrop of America's Black Power and Civil Rights movements, from the aftermath of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.'s assassination to the election of the first Biracial President of the United States, Barack Obama.


___________________________________________________



Swirl Girl is TaRessa's most personal work to date, detailing her underdog journey through childhood and adulthood as a bold, beautiful and brilliant Mixed girl in a Black and White world. Her life defies the beloved Tragic Mulatto narrative she inherited growing up in America to present a raw, honest and affirming sense of possibility for other Mixed-race people of all ages. 


___________________________________________________



TaRessa's journey is an inspiration to any human seeking to master their identity. Her message is simple: Each individual is the author of their own story and thus the only person who can police their own identity.


___________________________________________________


At 14-years-old, TaRessa was hired to train mental health professionals on the dynamics of Mixed-race identity. TaRessa has since published eight books and become an esteemed journalist who teaches, consults and coaches media leaders.


___________________________________________________


Swirl Girl is perfect for parents, young adults and educators who are affected by or interested in racial politics in America, where a recent study reports that 55% of Multi-racial kids don't feel good about their identity.

___________________________________________________


“TaRessa has the brains, heart, soul and writing ability to tell the story of how a Mixed girl becomes a Black woman while honoring her Jewish mother and all of her ancestry despite the world trying to make her do otherwise.” 

 --Dr. Joye Hardiman, professor emerita, The Evergreen State College

___________________________________________________


TaRessa is the author, co-author and/or co-editor of several fiction and non-fiction books, including:

· My Blue Suede Shoes: Four Novellas (Atria, 2011)

· Other People’s Skin: Four Novellas (Atria, 2007)

· The Hot Spot: a Novel (2005, BET & Harlequin)

· Proverbs for the People: African-American Literature (2007, Atria)

· A Love Supreme: Real-Life Stories of Black Love (2000, Time-Warner)

· The Buffalo Soldiers (African-American Achievers Series; 1997, Chelsea House)

· Catching Good Health with Homeopathic Medicine (1991, CRCS)

· Soulsong (1981, self-published)

___________________________________________________

story:
"Three years after his mother passed away, Gabriel discovers a journal filled with drawings. Little did he know one of the pages of that journal contained a drawing that would render his life changed forever. What he saw, in that moment, set him on course for the most reckless and profound experience of his life."


A little about the book:

Here’s what I’ve been telling everyone. 

        If you are familiar with the parable of the prodigal son, this is my revision of it with added characters and sub-plots that take place modern day. 

        The dialogue is easy to understand and the pages are not too many. Throw in a little sarcasm and romance (just don't mix the two) and you've got yourself a book worth reading. 

~Simple~

You’ll never look at your own life the same, when you read this book.

        The parable of the prodigal son holds certain profound truths. In this book, I perfectly express my understanding of these truths. Every character, every situation and every last detail is an actual piece of my life. My past and my future, all concocted into one deliciously orchestrated parable. 

Call to action: (Seeds to forests)

          A seed always starts small, but we already know what happens to a seed when it is planted in the right soil; it grows into what it’s meant to grow into. When this seed (book) grows into the tree it’s meant to be, it WILL produce fruit. The best part is that it doesn’t have to stop there. That fruit contains seeds of it’s own that will produce more trees. After enough time it will produce a forest. 

          My vision is to plant this seed in the correct soil and watch it achieve it’s maximum potential. Once this becomes a physical book, I promise to not stop there. I will do everything I can to take it to the next level and I will rely on God to do the rest. This is the perfect opportunity for you to invest into this potential. 

          Let me tell you about what I am doing now, and what you can do now, to see this seed grow. My campaign goal is to raise $5,000/30 days. The money raised will be used to complete the book, copyright it, publish it, and get it in your hands. Be the good soil, the water, and care that this seed needs to become what’s meant to be. In return, I will dedicate my time into seeing this seed become the forest it was designed it to be.

Snapchat username: gabrielsparable

Spotify: David Fortygin - The Prodigal Son (Public playlist)

#theprodigalson

#seedstoforests

story:
Now, here's a little story that must be told
About how Hip Hop in Miami had so much soul...

Miami's Hip Hop Newspaper was a free publication created by two visionairies, John Cordero and Cristina Solana, who wondered: how come a scene overrun with talent wasn't getting any coverage from the media? 

So they did it the Hip Hop way: by themselves


What is The Cipher?


This book is a compilation of the best of The Cipher, an independent newspaper published from 1998 to 2000.  It is also a memoir by the author, who arrived in Miami in 1995 and immersed himself in the underground Hip Hop scene at the time.

Chronicling the rise and fall of the publication, the book is a story of Hip Hop in Miami in the words of its artists and creators, taken from interviews and told as a narrative of unfiltered recollections and anecdotes.  Featuring never-before seen photos and memorabilia, it is a personal journey that stresses overcoming all odds alongside the trials and tribulations of Miami youngsters making sense of and reporting on the multi-million dollar rap industry developing around them in the mid-to-late ‘90’s.

Featuring interviews with stars such as DJ Craze as he began to dominate the competition, DJ Khaled from an underground radio station, and many more MC’s, DJ’s, graffiti artists, and B-Boys and Girls, The Cipher is a testament and historical record of the creativity and talent that rose from the streets of Miami to rule the charts and ultimately reign atop pop culture. 


Why crowdsource it?

Publishing a book is a daunting task! Thankfully, I have found an extremely talented designing company (www.cushygigs.com), who are also from the culture and have a body of work that speaks for itself.  Compiling, laying out, designing, and fine tuning over 200 photographs, original artwork, and approximately 65,000 words into a full-color product worthy of being sold is not easy, let alone something to leave to chance. 


Therefore, this campaign will cover the design and printing costs. The book will be offered in traditional bound paperback format (old school) and digital e-book for Kindle, iPad, Nook, and other e-readers (new school). Quotes have already been submitted and accepted, all that's required are the funds to get started!


Why buy one now?

This will be a limited-edition one-of-a-kind book! The print run will be 200 copies.  From the historical photographs of long-gone graffiti masterpieces, to DJ Khaled's first-ever feature story (major key), to long-form interviews with dearly departed artists such as Phife Dawg, to a review of Pitbull's first record, The Cipher speaks of a Miami that no longer exists, yet its influence can be seen and heard today (just look at the charts and MTV). 

By contributing now, you can rest easy knowing that you have reserved a piece of Hip Hop history and avoid the resale prices on eBay. This is your chance to get it first!  Plus, you get exclusive content, goodies, and major props.


What do you get?

Aside from being the coolest kid on your block once you have your book in hand or in bits, your contributions will be rewarded with unique memorabilia, including:

  • Out-of-print sticker packs
  • Original backstage and behind the scenes photographs
  • Promotional shots of top artists
  • Original copies of The Cipher: Miami's Hip Hop Newspaper
  • Promo cassettes and VHS tapes (for that vintage feel)
  • Original artwork used in the book


See the press kit here
Read an article from the Miami New Times here

artists, and B-Boys and Girls, The
Cipher is a testament and historical record of the creativity and talent
that rose from the streets of Miami to rule the charts and ultimately reign
atop pop culture.  Why crowdsource it?Publishing a book is a daunting task! Thankfully, I have found an extremely talented designing company (www.cushygigs.com), who are also from the culture and have a body of work that speaks for itself.  Compiling, laying out, designing, and fine tuning over 200 photographs, original artwork, and approximately 65,000 words into a full-color product worthy of being sold is not easy, let alone something to leave to chance.  Therefore, this campaign will cover the design and printing costs. The book will be offered in traditional bound paperback format (old school) and digital e-book for Kindle, iPad, Nook, and other e-readers (new school). Quotes have already been submitted and accepted, all that's required are the funds to get started!Why buy one now?This will be a limited-edition one-of-a-kind book! The print run will be 200 copies.  From the historical photographs of long-gone graffiti masterpieces, to DJ Khaled's first-ever feature story (major key), to long-form interviews with dearly departed artists such as Phife Dawg, to a review of Pitbull's first record, The Cipher speaks of a Miami that no longer exists, yet its influence can be seen and heard today (just look at the charts and MTV).  By contributing now, you can rest easy knowing that you have reserved a piece of Hip Hop history and avoid the resale prices on eBay. This is your chance to get it first!  Plus, you get exclusive content, goodies, and major props.What do you get?
Aside from being the coolest kid on your block once you have your book in hand or in bits, your contributions will be rewarded with unique memorabilia, including:
Out-of-print sticker packs
Original backstage and behind the scenes photographs
Promotional shots of top artists
Original copies of The Cipher: Miami's Hip Hop Newspaper

Promo cassettes and VHS tapes (for that vintage feel)
Original artwork used in the book

See the press kit hereRead an article from the Miami New Times here

story:
Hello! My name is Nikki and I am the CEO of The Dragon's Rocketship Publishing, LLC. My business partner, Mandi, and I started the idea of this business a few months ago and as of February 1st, 2016 it is officially live and accepting submissions. We are both new to the business experience but are passionate about the writing world, and personally I love to help people see their dreams come true. The feeling you get when you see your name on printed paper is one of the best! Of course, the catch with running a business is the cost. There have been quite a few unexpected costs that have come up throughout the last few months, starting with the LLC, ECIN licence, what it will cost for the custom universal ISBN, cost of marketing, cost of new equipment (such as laptops, web hosting) to ensure that we are able to provide the best services possible, and cost of lawyers to ensure that we are doing everything we can to protect the rights of not only the authors and sub contractors, but ourselves. With your help we can make The Dragon's Rocketship Publishing, LLC an amazing company, that wants to see it's authors grow, and wants to see all submissions improve and have a chance for success, even if it's not with our company. Please consider donating, sharing, liking, submitting your novels, and just providing your love. Thank you, Nikki Yager, CEO

story:
Conscious Template

Hi, I’m Glen Martin. I need your help to help millions of children around the world. The future of our planet is in the hands of our children and grandchildren and how the future unfolds depends on how they are parented and educated today.  

In America I worked 78 hours a week as a child therapist seeing children who were on multiply psychiatric medications. Utilizing a wholistic approach that included parenting classes and medical supervision over 99% of these children were successfully tapered off all of their meds.  I wanted to help as many children as possible and I finally realized no matter how many hours I worked millions of children were and are still being prescribed psychiatric medications because of inappropriate parenting.

So after I closed down my clinic and came to India to write the definitive parenting book. There is no agreement between the parenting experts. The conservative parenting experts claim that liberal parenting spoils children and the liberal parenting experts claim that conservative parenting traumatize them and they are both correct in their assumptions. When I was growing up children were more often traumatized and now they are much more likely to be spoiled. So I decided I would look at parenting historically, developmentally, culturally, religiously, biologically and from every relevant domain I could think of to resolve this dilemma. I thought it would have taken me two or three years to write this book but instead it took me ten years of intensive research and living in various cultures around the world.

While triangulating these various domains an all-encompassing paradigm of paradigms emerged. Conscious Template is a grand unifying paradigm that explains the disagreements within any domain and the commonality between domains.

Conscious template is the Rosetta Stone of paradigms and the Holy Grail of philosophers and scholars. By overlaying this grand unifying model insights, truths and errors are revealed within any theoretical model. Conscious Template will help you better understand not only parenting but relationships, psychology, politics, religions, science, business, cultures, education and history as well. Conscious Template is a paradigm shift that integrates all domains and explains the differences and the similarities within any domain.

Earth will some day be in the hands of our children and proper parenting and education now are the two most important variables for the optimal outcome of mankind later. Help me help millions of children and learn how to be the best parent or teacher you can possibly be. This information is literally priceless. It will change your life, the lives of your loved ones and the world. 

Funding Needs

I would like to invite you to support this project in it's launching phase. The books are completed and the next step now is to raise enough money to publish them. Funds will be used for publishing the books and to build a website where I can sell present and future titles as well as interact with readers. 

I offer unique perks to my campaign supporters, including counselling sessions with me on Skype. This is a rare opportunity since I stopped seeing individual clients years ago and now mostly do workshops and lectures. Check out the perks in the sidebar. 

Help me spread the word about this campaign and use the Indiegogo share tools to let your friends know about this project! 

Thank you so much for helping me make these books a reality.

Yours Sincerely,

Glen Martin

story:
Short Summary

     Howrah Train Station has 21 platforms and handles hundreds of trains and over one million passengers daily. There are a massive number of children who live in the station and under the platforms. Many of the children are addicted to sniffing glue and drugs. Physical and sexual abuse are every day events in their lives.

     Your contributions will go to help reach, restore, and reconnect the children of the Howrah Train Station with their families and reintegrate them into society by providing a rescue home as an alternate environment to teach them healthy ways to live, Children's lives are transformed through biblical teaching, education, sports, and practical help.

     Frontline Kids exists to help meet needs of children at risk all over the world. Tom and Cristy George, founders of Frontline Kids were each widowed immediately after their children were born. The Lord showed them HIS heart when their  kids were motherless and fatherless, and they desire to do the same for the street kids of Kolkata, India, where they spent their honeymoon after the Lord united their families.

What We Need & What You Get

     We would like to raise $12,300 to support their immediate needs for one year as defined below:

-Approximately $47 per child x 15 = $700 per month

     The above amount includes rent for the project house, maintenance, utilities, medical needs, and educational material. Food needs are already being covered by Frontline Kids.

-Missionary support to Indian family that care for the boys = $325 per month

     We would like to raise an additional $10, 000 to go towards the following additional needs. Any excess will be applied specifically to the following--clothing, musical instruments, project vehicle, camera, sew machine, their own land for gardening. All funds will be applied to this project whether or not the goal is met.
     For all gifts over $25, please accept a copy of our book, "Under the Shadow of the Almighty", a story of beauty from ashes and healing from grief, from which the Lord birthed Frontline Kids.

The Impact

     Becoming a partner with Frontline Kids is a wise investment that will change children's lives who, otherwise, would continue to live without love or hope.

Risks & Challenges

     Since 2012 many children have been returned to parents, delivered from drug addictions, learned to read and write, learned job skills, and most importantly made Jesus Christ their Lord. Of course, this comes through much effort and prayer, and some children leave before their transformation is complete. However, the love of God compels us to continue in faith, helping those who will let us.

Other Ways You Can Help

     If you can't help financially, you are still a valuable partner! Pray that many children will come to the saving knowledge of Jesus Christ and the wonderful plan and purpose He has for their lives. Please share our request with your social media contacts!
