story:
“We are a publishing company committed to literacy-based social empowerment (click to learn more). For every book sold, we donate $1 to establish resource centers for orphanages in developing countries where these kids can learn, dream, and grow.

Just because a kid like her is an orphan today doesn’t mean she has to be average or disadvantaged for the rest of her life. Food and shelter are important, but they are simply not enough in this 21st century world. Books, computers, and learning opportunities have the ability to inspire these kids to dream, grow, and make something great of their lives. Two projects are currently being completed in Africa, reaching estimated 700 orphans.

But why are we doing this? Each member of our team has a unique story. But here is just one example, from Professor Francis Umesiri. 

Click here now to read his personal story as narrated in this newspaper article.

The only way we can accomplish this goal is through direct partnership with change-makers like you – readers and writers alike. Tell your story, and help us demonstrate that a publishing house can thrive even while looking after its authors and investing in orphans across the world? Your contribution makes that statement. And to be sure, we offer interesting perks that make it all worthwhile for you as well. Please support us. Thanks.”

The Kharis Team

Please Click  Here Now to Meet the Team

We are a publishing company driven by a higher purpose - the desire to make a difference within the social empowerment ecosystem. As a literacy-based social entrepreneurship, we pursue a two-fold agenda that are mutually complementary:

1. Empowering orphans in developing countries to take charge of their future through literacy initiates, by establishing resource centers or libraries in their orphanages. To this end, we donate $1 for every book sold, to establish such libraries. Also, 25% of proceeds from this campaign will go directly into the orphanage library project.

Why? Just because someone is an orphan right now in a developing world doesn’t mean their future has to be limited too. We believe in the power of books and literacy initiatives to inspire these orphans to dream and aspire towards a better future. We are currently completing two projects in West Africa - reaching about 700 orphans. Our goal is to complete five of such projects each year. Your support makes that possible. Watch this inspiring 1-minute video, to understand what drives us at Kharis Publishing regarding these amazing kids. 

 

2. Giving voice to underrepresented authors – women, minorities, internationals, and first-time authors – by publishing their books in the USA, absolutely free.

Why? Just because someone doesn't have a big platform or national name-recognition doesn't mean his or her voice shouldn't be heard. We believe everyone deserves to tell their story, free of charge, irrespective of name recognition, financial ability, or big platform. We provide full traditional publishing benefits for underrepresented authors, namely, fully vetted acquisition processes, professional editing, design, production, and distribution. Absolutely no charge to the author at any stage. If you have something important and original to say, you will have the full benefit of a professional publishing house. You don't have to spend a fortune or be preyed upon by vanity presses just to publish your book. Plus, we offer our authors 40% flat royalty rate on net receipts. No secret negotiations. What you earn doesn’t have to depend on your negotiation skill, but rather on actual book sales. Please visit our website for more details: https://www.kharispublishing.com . If you have a unique story to tell in fiction or nonfiction, we will love to hear from you. Send query to support@kharispublishing.com. This one-minute video also clarifies our passion to help underrepresented authors. 

 

  • High quality submissions from across the world - 10 countries and counting
  • Two resource centers now reaching about 700 orphans
  • Empowerment of authors to tell their story

       Here is a testimonial from one of our authors:

“My inspiration to write a book came through my love to write and the need to tell my story. My life became hard. I found myself drowning in suicidal depression. I bottled all my emotions inside of me. When I broke open and all my emotions came pouring out, I found writing helped the most. My book ‘Discovering True Love’ was born. The hardest part was writing about my mistakes and going into depth of why I became suicidal. As a Christian, I felt like a failure. After a few years of playing with my manuscript, I decided to see if a publisher would accept my work. I heard from a few other authors that this process could take a while and I could be denied several times before I would get accepted. I began my search. I had no money, no phone, and no idea what I was doing. All I knew was I needed an old fashion publishing company… I sent Kharis Publishing my manuscript. Kharis Publishing accepted me. I’ve had a blast and so much fun working with the editor Kharis Publishing assigned me. I was new and learned as we went. They were very patient with me. It’s been fun getting to know my editor and I loved the comments she would put on my manuscript when she looked over my work. I encourage other writers to also send Kharis Publishing their manuscripts because they have helped me to bring out the beauty of my story. They have helped me transform my 'caterpillar-of-a-manuscript' into a beautiful colorful butterfly. I hope my book will help others to find hope and true love...”

~Author H.E. Olsen

We know that our publishing model is unique and disruptive in some ways within the current publishing ecosystem. For it to succeed, the direct partnership and support of friends and supporters like you is essential. Here are three ways you can be a part of this social venture:

1.  Contribute to the cause and help launch our authors forward. Any amount will do:  $10, $25, $50, $100 or $150. Our partners and supporters are called Kharis & Friends; a group of individual supporters and friends who care enough about social empowerment to do something about it, together. Your contribution today qualifies you as a Kharis & Friends member, with all benefits. Click here to learn more about Kharis & Friends: https://www.kharispublishing.com/kharis-friends/. 

2. The second level of support is simply buying books from Kharis Publishing. Every time you buy a Kharis published book, you are helping in two ways: First, we donate $1 from each book sale directly to build libraries for orphanages; every single book, every single time. It adds up pretty fast. Second, each book purchased supports and empowers an author. Every book you select during this campaign serves as a sale for that author. Our authors receive 40% flat royalty on net receipts from such sales, based on the retail price. Please watch this 1-minute video that shows the difference that $1 can make.

 

 

3. The third area of support is in shipping these books and computers abroad. Shipping books overseas is very expensive; on average about $3.65 per pound. Your donation today helps immensely in getting these books and computers to the orphanages. 25% of proceeds from this campaign have been earmarked to acquire and ship resources overseas. Here are some books and computers currently awaiting shipment to a recipient orphanage in Accra, Ghana.

         

 

Whether you are able to contribute financially or not, there are other ways you can support this project:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, PLEASE.
  • Use the share tools to share this campaign with friends on social media.
  • If you have friends who are writers, let them know that Kharis Publishing may be able to help them get published free of charge.
  • Volunteer as an experienced editor, sales or business development professional.
  • Register your support for our social empowerment venture (free).
  • If you have a unique story to tell in fiction or nonfiction, we will love to hear from you. Send query to support@kharispublishing.com 

Thank you!!

Please check the 'Perks' for details. In addition to receiving up to fourteen books, you will also get the following perks:

  • Any donation today qualifies you to receive 40% discount from the Kharis Publishing Shop for the next one year. It doesn't matter how many books - one copy or 1000 copies.
  • Your donation today also allows you to become a member of Kharis & Friends, with all member benefits. Click here now to check out Kharis & Friends.

 

Clarifications:

1. About 10 of the following books are brand new, scheduled for release this Fall, and so are pre-orders. Digital copies will be available on August 30, 2016, but print versions will be available on  October 1, 2016.

2. Offers for printed books are only for contributors within the United States of America. People residing outside USA will receive only digital versions of the books.

3. Finally, please let us know of the book(s) of your choice so we can get them sent to you. Even if you forget, we will follow up to make sure that you get just the right book. Browse Away!

After a few years of playing with my manuscript, I decided to see if a publisher would accept my work. I heard from a few other authors that this process could take a while and I could be denied several times before I would get accepted. I began my search. I had no money, no phone, and no idea what I was doing. All I knew was I needed an old fashion publishing company… I sent Kharis Publishing my manuscript. Kharis Publishing accepted me. I’ve had a blast and so much fun working with the editor Kharis Publishing assigned me. I was new and learned as we went. They were very patient with me. It’s been fun getting to know my editor and I loved the comments she would put on my manuscript when she looked over my work. I encourage other writers to also send Kharis Publishing their manuscripts because they have helped me to bring out the beauty of my story. They have helped me transform my 'caterpillar-of-a-manuscript' into a beautiful colorful butterfly. I hope my book will help others to find hope and true love...”
~Author H.E. Olsen


We know that our publishing model is unique and disruptive in some ways within the current publishing ecosystem. For it to succeed, the direct partnership and support of friends and supporters like you is essential. Here are three ways you can be a part of this social venture:
1.  Contribute to the cause and help launch our authors forward. Any amount will do:  $10, $25, $50, $100 or $150. Our partners and supporters are called Kharis & Friends; a group of individual supporters and friends who care enough about social empowerment to do something about it, together. Your contribution today qualifies you as a Kharis & Friends member, with all benefits. Click here to learn more about Kharis & Friends: https://www.kharispublishing.com/kharis-friends/. 
2. The second level of support is simply buying books from Kharis Publishing. Every time you buy a Kharis published book, you are helping in two ways: First, we donate $1 from each book sale directly to build libraries for orphanages; every single book, every single time. It adds up pretty fast. Second, each book purchased supports and empowers an author. Every book you select during this campaign serves as a sale for that author. Our authors receive 40% flat royalty on net receipts from such sales, based on the retail price. Please watch this 1-minute video that shows the difference that $1 can make.
 

 
3. The third area of support is in shipping these books and computers abroad. Shipping books overseas is very expensive; on average about $3.65 per pound. Your donation today helps immensely in getting these books and computers to the orphanages. 25% of proceeds from this campaign have been earmarked to acquire and ship resources overseas. Here are some books and computers currently awaiting shipment to a recipient orphanage in Accra, Ghana.
         
 


Whether you are able to contribute financially or not, there are other ways you can support this project:

Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, PLEASE.
Use the share tools to share this campaign with friends on social media.
If you have friends who are writers, let them know that Kharis Publishing may be able to help them get published free of charge.
Volunteer as an experienced editor, sales or business development professional.

Register your support for our social empowerment venture (free).
If you have a unique story to tell in fiction or nonfiction, we will love to hear from you. Send query to support@kharispublishing.com 


Thank you!!

Please check the 'Perks' for details. In addition to receiving up to fourteen books, you will also get the following perks:

Any donation today qualifies you to receive 40% discount from the Kharis Publishing Shop for the next one year. It doesn't matter how many books - one copy or 1000 copies.
Your donation today also allows you to become a member of Kharis & Friends, with all member benefits. Click here now to check out Kharis & Friends.

 Clarifications:1. About 10 of the following books are brand new, scheduled for release this Fall, and so are pre-orders. Digital copies will be available on August 30, 2016, but print versions will be available on  October 1, 2016.2. Offers for printed books are only for contributors within the United States of America. People residing outside USA will receive only digital versions of the books.3. Finally, please let us know of the book(s) of your choice so we can get them sent to you. Even if you forget, we will follow up to make sure that you get just the right book. Browse Away!

story:
Sierra Leone: dopo l'Ebola, il paese rinasce e riprende poco a poco, i turisti ritornano ad affacciarsi sulle sue spiagge, le sue foreste e, soprattutto, a incontrare i sorrisi della gente che vuole rifarsi dopo quasi due anni di restrizioni sociali ed economiche che l’hanno messa in ginocchio. Le imprese riaprono e ne nascono di nuove

Star Shop è una di queste: un nuovo negozio di cibo e bevande che aprirà i battenti sull’onda dell’entusiasmo di tre donne intraprendenti e consapevoli che la libertà di scelta (del partner, della casa, del futuro dei figli) passa anche attraverso l'indipendenza economica.

Spezie, riso, olio, frutta, verdura e tutti gli altri ingredienti confezionati per una buona cucina; bevande e alcolici; il tutto all’ingrosso e al minuto; musica in sottofondo, possibilità di consegna a domicilio e tanta simpatia, disponibilità e sorrisi: questo è Star Shop, un piccolo negozio di alimenti e bevande. Grande nel cuore delle creatrici.

Mariama, Isha e Mbalu, le imprenditrici di Star Shop, sono nate e cresciute nel quartiere di Malama (Freetown) e hanno fatto molti lavori diversi. Hanno tra 25 e 30 anni e finora si sono sperimentate nel commercio ambulante di vestiti e scarpe, pulizia di case e uffici, babysitteraggio. Pur mettendoci tutta la buona volontà, spesso sono stati lavori sporadici, spesso malpagati. Adesso hanno deciso di diventare padrone della loro vita e di crearsi il loro futuro.

"Abbiamo il piacere di presentarti Star Shop perchè siamo alla ricerca di fondi per finanziare lo start up, il primo anno di attività, durante il quale l'impresa metterà le sue basi per continuare a crescere e per consolidarsi."

Attraverso i fondi raccolti, si finanziaranno il fondo, l'arredamento e il primo stock di prodotti da mettere in vendita.

"Il fondo è stato individuato e il contratto di affitto firmato per due anni. Qualche lavoro di finitura come le piastrelle del pavimento, una mano di bianco per dar luce all'interno, il bancone, la scaffalatura e il negozio sarà pronto per essere inaugurato."

"Ci vogliamo equipaggiare di un buon frigo congelatore, per tenere al fresco le bibite (tra cui anche succhi fatti in casa come bissap e ginger beer). Per accendere il frigo accorre la corrente elettrica e installare il contatore è costoso ma con il tuo contributo ce la faremo. Più avanti ci doteremo anche di un piccolo gruppo elettrogeno per sopperire alle carenze della rete elettrica nazionale."

Con questa prima campagna vi chiediamo di contribuire alle spese generali dei primi mesi, all’acquisto di una parte della merce e del congelatore per aiutarci cominciare con noi questo nuovo ed eccitante viaggio.

Keep smiling and have a nice journey!

story:
Sommario

L'idea di pubblicare questo volume nasce dalla passione per l'oplologia e la guerra medievale-rinascimentale di uno storico, Gabriele Zweilawyer,  e di disegnatore professionista, Francesco Saverio Ferrara.

Il volume sarà stampato interamente a colori e conterrà dieci monografie, diversi focus su armi e battaglie, e oltre venti disegni originali di Francesco Saverio Ferrara.

  • Dopo due lauree e duecento articoli specialistici, Gabriele Zweilawyer ha pubblicato due volumi storici (Storia della Presa di Salamina e del Comandante Marcantonio Bragadin e Gli Arabi in Israele) e collaborato con diversi professori e ricercatori universitari. Il suo sito, www.zweilawyer.com, ha ricevuto 5 milioni e mezzo di visite negli ultimi quattro anni, mentre la sua pagina FB, Zhistorica, ha oltre 20.000 follower.                                               Lavorando su diverse fonti, specie ottocentesche, hq riportato alla luce la storia di tre personaggi storici di eccezionale interesse, Pier Gerlofs Donia, Pregeant de Bideoux ed Enrico V di Brunswick.
  • Francesco Saverio Ferrara è uno degli illustratori italiani di maggior talento. Dopo il liceo artistico, dove frequenta i grandi maestri della pittura e del disegno, ha continuato gli studi al monastero benedettino apprendendo l’arte della miniatura e della calligrafia. I suoi lavori a tema medievale e fantasy riscuotono da anni l'apprezzamento degli esperti del settore e di tutti gli appassionati.                                                                                                                                

Come puoi contribuire

Oltre ad acquistare uno dei quattro Box previsti dal progetto (Steel, Silver, Golden, Diamond), puoi contribuire anche tramite il passaparola, magari linkando il progetto sulla tua pagina social o parlandone con gli amici.

story:
"Who Farted?" is a picture book for young children. It is about a young boy named Alexander who hears a strange rumble and searches for what could have let one rip. He meets many different animals (and a few family members, too) on his hunt for who dealt the BIG, STINKY FART!

"Who Farted?" is a simple, easy-to-read story. The illustrations provide lots of room for the reader(s) to explore with the main character, Alexander. The topic is perfect for the younger reader who likes to laugh about bodily functions. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are getting ready to enter the production phase of the creation process. Since we are self-publishing, there are a lot of expenses coming our way. This GoGo is intended to help fund the completion, marketing, and publication of the final product; a fun paperback story about FARTS.

There are lots of fun perks available to anyone who makes contributions at the $15, $25, $50 level. But other levels of contributions are always welcomed.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help out by:

  • Sharing our Facebook page
  • Sharing our Webpage
  • AND sharing our IndieGoGo campaign page. 
  • Tell your friends and share in the fun.

story:
For writers + book professionals

Hi, and thank you for visiting! A little history: Back in 2007 as a professional book designer, I had clients who had written several books but couldn't afford to pay for custom cover design. So I set out to hire a development team and create BookCoverPro—Book cover design software expressly developed for creating affordable, high-quality, professional covers. BookCoverPro has since helped thousands of writers all over the world create their own stunning cover designs for print books and ebooks. Shortly after, PrintMarketingPro was developed for creating book marketing materials as an affordable alternative to other desktop publishing programs.

 

BookCoverPro interface + cover examples:

Over the years, we've received many kudos... Here are a few:

"I want to say that the bookcoverpro is brilliant and I like it very much." —Kelvin Edokpolo, Bigedo International UG

"...Love this program. Very easy and intuitive to use.” —Judy McFarlen

"Hi Angie, I received the cd today, and I wish to thank you for all of your help. The program is amazing.” —Randy Belaire  

"BookCoverPro Team, Thank you for your excellence, leadership, and client focus. The covers for 3 editions of Psalms of Fern are all beautiful....Thanks again, I appreciate it." —R. Girard Tournesol

"As a self-publisher, BookCoverPro is my favorite purchase, love it! P.S. Plus I am saving hundreds of dollars.” —Bernie Malonson

"BCP is an excellent program. I found it to be very easy and intuitive with which to work; and has the capability to produce highly professional-looking dust jackets in a short time.  You are only limited by your own creativity."
—Anthony Marolda, winbridgegroup.com

Now, my partners and I would like to extend our vision of helping independent writers and small publishers by taking our existing programs, improve upon them, add interior page design—and combine everything into one power-packed software mega-package: BookCreative.

Introducing our New Product: BookCreative™ Software

BookCreative is a plug+go program that includes everything needed for a stunning, sophisticated, professional book: Create full cover designs, format and design pages, and build a variety of promotional materials, all in one. Each feature of BookCreative is designed to work harmoniously together to ensure a professionally created book, consistent in its overall look and marketing. Robust, yet still very easy and fun to use, BookCreative can be used in its entirety or only for what is needed - cover, page formatting, or marketing. Choose to convert your finished piece from several formats, ready for submission to your printer.

Here are the basics of BookCreative:

  • Windows + Macintosh platforms
  • One-time purchase, or subscribe as-needed
  • Templates gallery
  • Uses your own fonts
  • Zoom view + grid view
  • YOU keep ALL rights to your design, forever.

And here are the specific features of each design area:

  • Customize size, trim area, bleed, flap option
  • Create from scratch, or choose a pre-designed template
  • Centimeters, inches, or points
  • Work in either 300 or 600 dpi resolution
  • Preview your work
  • RGB or CMYK color mode
  • Text + paragraph styling
  • Custom color palette
  • Apply shapes, borders + embellishments
  • Free background patterns + images
  • Generate your own ISBN barcode
  • Import + manipulate your own images, photos, + graphics
  • Compatible with online book printers and platforms like Kindle
  • Save your finished cover in PDF, TIF, JPG, GIF or PNG
  • Choose to generate cover in 2D or 3D with different view options
  • Compatible with any online or traditional book printer

  • Customize size + margin area
  • Create from scratch, or choose a pre-designed template
  • Apply several elements—like chapter/section heads, sidebars, footnote area, charts, indexing + more
  • Text + paragraph styling
  • Auto-correct option
  • Image import + manipulation
  • Embellishments + borders

  • Create Brochures, Fliers, Mailers, E-books, Bookmarks, Bumper stickers, Posters, Business Cards, CD/DVD covers, Postcards, Envelopes
  • Create from scratch, or choose a pre-designed template
  • Work in either 300 or 600 dpi resolution
  • Text + paragraph styling
  • Import your images, photos, + graphics
  • Save your finished piece in PDF, TIF, JPG, GIF or PNG

What We Need:
We need funding for BookCreative's program development. Having this amount upfront keeps our overhead costs low so we can pass along the savings.

How Much Will It Cost?

We plan to offer this program either as an outright purchase for $247, or as a subscription for $10/month. However, preordering through this campaign will be significantly lower – see perks!
Where The Money Goes:
We will be hiring a development team to take on our project where it has left off: Improve and enhance upon it, add the interior page design component, give it a fun, easy interface, and combine everything into one powerful package. This is not a small request, so after an exhaustive interview process, we have finally found the right team to handle the job—and also handle my crazy idea whims. With development comes quality assurance to ensure functionality, and that includes a lot of testing. The amount we ask covers the following:
  1. Software development
  2. Q/A process - testing, testing.... and more testing
  3. Indiegogo fees
We estimate product completion and launch in October-November 2016, and at that time will be contacting everyone who contributed $10 or more to deliver their program or reserve their memberships.

But... {gasp} What if we don't meet our goal?

That will be very sad indeed... :(( But we are prepared to use whatever we have to improve upon our existing programs. I promise, your contributions will be put to good use!

However, if we exceed our amount....

Get ready for some awesome stretch goals! We have some amazing rewards planned, like professional editing and marketing services.... exclusive book promotions with airlines (yep, we know people).... day spa retreats.... and so much more! Stay tuned.

Oh yeah! I almost forgot...

We are also providing an a-la-carte gallery of premium templates—and this is where we need artists who wish to earn a nice residual commission. We have thousands of customers using our current BookCoverPro templates, and we predict an even greater need with BookCreative! Templates are needed for cover designs, page designs, and marketing materials. Submission (and potential income) is unlimited. Further instruction will be provided. 

....And I think that about covers it!

(Covers it... Get it...? Sorry...) We are very excited to embark on this project because I truly believe that as a book professional, I can do my part to help writers succeed as published authors. As they say, everyone has a book inside of them... so let's work together to help bring out more people's stories and talents for the world to enjoy. :)

Other ways you can help...

Please, please help us spread the word! Remember, sharing is caring. You are awesome. Thank you!
